245 <l n="a">hiraṇyaśr̥ṅgah sa mahān divyo maṇimayo giriḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hana ta vukir hiraṇyaśr̥ṅga ṅaranya, kakośa deniṅ gunuṅ menaka, maṇimaya pinakavaknya. ṅkana ta yan hana deśa kañcanabaluka ṅaranya, lavan ikaṅ talaga riṅ vindusara, ikaṅ prasiddha patapan mahārāja bhagīratha, tan pahiṅan konanunaṅnya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tatra tripathagā devī prathamaṁ tu pratiṣṭhitā</l>
250 <l n="b">brahmalokād atikrāntā saptadhā pratipadyate,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ṅkana ta tambe bhaṭṭārī gaṅgān turunturun saṅkeṅ svarga, umili ta sira piṅ pitu ri vəkasan. pratyekaniṅ aranya: vesvota, sara, pāvanī, sarasvatī, jambunadī, sita, gaṅgā, kavvalu sindu.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">etā divyāḥ sapta gaṅgās triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ,</l>
255 </lg>
. <p>nahan tāvak saṅ hyaṅ gaṅgān pituṅ siki, prasiddha karəṅə̄ riṅ triloka. valuyakəna taṅ ujar ṅuni, pariñci nikaṅ vukir sovaṅ-sovaṅ.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">rakṣāṁsi vai himavati hemakūṭe tu guhyakaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">sarve narāś ca niṣadhe merau caiva tapodhanāḥ,</l>
260 </lg>
. <p>yan vukir himavān, rakṣasa prabala ṅkana; yapvan iṅ hemakūṭa, yakṣa prasiddhākveh i rika; kunaṅ riṅ nisadha, <pb edRef="#edG" n="19"/> mānuṣa kalyan ṅkana; riṅ mahāmeru, vatək siddharṣi tamolah ṅkana.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">gandharvā rṣayo nityaṁ tatra brahmarṣayo nr̥pa</l>
. <l n="b">daityānāṁ danavānāṁ ca śvetaḥ parvata ucyate,</l>
265 </lg>
. <p>yapvan ikaṅ tamolah i rikaṅ vukir śveta, gandharva daitya danava, lavan brahmarṣi juga.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">śrṅgavāṁs tu mahārāja pitr̥̄nāṁ pratisañcaraḥ,</l>
. </lg>
270 <p>kunaṅ tamolah i rikaṅ vukir śr̥ṅgavan, pitr̥gaṇa juga prasiddha ṅkana. sājñā haji! təlas kahiḍəp de parameśvara?</p>
. <p>om anaku sanjaya! huvus kekət hatiṅku sapavarahmu kabeh. kunaṅ pva tulusakən demv acarita, ikaṅ jambūdvīpa.</p>
. <p>sājñā haji! tan dadya patik haji tan saṅkepakəna təkapniṅ pinakaṅhulun majarajara. nihan rəṅə̄n de haji:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">dakṣiṇena tu nīlasya meroḥ pārśve tathottare</l>
275 <l n="b">tatra vr̥kṣā madhuphalā nityapuṣpaphalopagāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ri lambuṅniṅ mahāmeru lor, kidul saṅkeṅ vukir nīlagiri, ṅkana ta kakvehan iṅ kayu mahāpavitra, nityaśākambaṅ avvah, tan pakaləvasan, mahātiśaya manisni rasanya. maṅkana taṅ ləmah ṅkana, maṇimaya pinakarūpanya, kanakālit pinakaləbuləbunya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">ye kṣaranti sadā kṣīraṁ sadrasam hy amr̥topamam</l>
280 <l n="b">vastrāṇi ca prasYyante phaleṣv ābharaṇāni ca,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hana ta kayv agətih mahāmr̥ta, kesyan ikaṅ ṣaḍrasa deni rasanya, vastra dukūla pinakalambanya, salvirniṅ bhuṣaṇa pinakalvirniṅ vvahnya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">devalokacyutāḥ sarve jāyante tatra mānavāḥ,</l>
285 </lg>
. <p>maṅkana taṅ vvaṅ kana, devatanurun sakeṅ svarga, ya ta prasiddhāṅjanma rikaṅ deśa ṅkana.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">śuklabhijanasampannah, sarve supriyadarśanāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
290 <p>śuddhajanma ta ya tuvi, konaṅunaṅ kavulatanya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">teṣāṁ te kṣīrināṁ kṣīraṁ pivanty amr̥tasannibham,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>aṅhel pva yakrīda lavan strīnya. təkvan mara ya tan <pb edRef="#edG" n="20"/> dadi kəna riṅ lara śoka salavasnyan dadi, sukhatmaka pinakasvabhavanya, satus ivu tahun lavan sevu tahun prəmanani huripnya.</p>
295 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">bhāruṇḍā nāma śakunās tīkṣṇatuṇḍā mahābalaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">tān haranti mr̥tān sarvān darīṣu prakṣipanti ca,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hana ta manuk bharunda ṅaranya ṅkana, agəṅ alaṇḍəp patuknya, tan pahiṅan śaktinya. ya tomalap śava nikaṅ vvaṅ mati ṅkana, vinavanya ri daləm guha, hiṅanyan tan hana vaṅke katon ṅkana.</p>
300 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tatra pūrvābhisaṅas tu kālāmraś ca mahādrumaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">śubhaś ca yojanotsedhaḥ siddhacāraṇasevitaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>sampun ta ṅaran ikaṅ lorniṅ meru vinarnana, vetan iṅ meru ta gumantya caritan, makahiṅaṇa deśaniṅ bhadraśva. hana ta vvavvahan kālāmra ṅaranya, kadi poh suṅsaṅ tadakaranya, mahāparipūrṇa, sayojana parimaṇḍalanya mvaṅ paṅadəgnya, siddhacaran. akveh ri ya maṅantī sornya.</p>
305 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tatra te puruṣah śvetas tejoyuktā manasvinaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>lavan ta rūpaniṅ vvaṅ kana, aputih pinakavarṇanya, suprakaśātah tejanya, prajña vihikan maṅaji.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
310 <l n="a">striyaḥ kumudavarnāś ca sundaryaḥ priyadarśanāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ lvir nikaṅ anakbi ṅkana, kadi varṇaniṅ śvetakumuda varṇanya, tatan pramana hayunya konaṅunaṅni katiṅhalanya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">candraprabhāś candravarṇāḥ,</l>
315 </lg>
. <p>kadi tejaniṅ vulan tika tejanya, kadi varṇaniṅ vulan varṇanya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">pūrṇacandranibhānanāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
320 <p>maṅkanātah mukhanya, kadi vulan pūrṇama;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">candraśītalarātryaś ca,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kadi tisniṅ vulan ri kalaniṅ ratrī tis nika sparśanya;</p>
325 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">nr̥ttagītaviśāradāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>vidagdha ta yen nrttagītaprakara.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
330 <l n="a">
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="21"/>daśavarṣasahasrāṇi tatrāyur bharatarṣabha,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ prəmanani huripnya, sapuluh ivu tahun prəmananya, nitya pva yāmukti vvah nikaṅ kalamravr̥kṣa; ya ta mataṅnyan nityayovana.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
335 <l n="a">dakṣiṇe tu ca nīlasya niṣadhasyottaretaraḥ</l>
. <l n="b">sudarśano nāma mahān jambūvrkṣah sanātanaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ ikaṅ kidulniṅ vukir nīlagiri, kalor deniṅ vukir nisadha, ṅkana ta kahanan ikaṅ jambuvr̥kṣa, inaranan sudarśana, tan pahiṅan haləpnya, sadakala tan kinavruhan nvamnya ṅuni.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
340 <l n="a">tasya nāmnā samākhyāto jambūdvīpaḥ sanātanaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ya ta hetu nikaṅ deśa inaranan jambudvīpa, apan anəlah ṅaran ikaṅ kayu hane ri ya. kunaṅ ruhurnya sevv atus yojana, suṇḍul riṅ ākāśa pva ya, kunaṅ gə̄ṅnya limavəlas yojana, satus ivu kvehni paṅnya, salviraniṅ rasaviśeṣa pinakarasanya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">patamānaphalāny ūrdhvaṁ kurvanti vipulaṁ svanam,</l>
345 </lg>
. <p>tiba pva vvahnya sake ruhur, guməntər ta ya karəṅə̄ sakeṅ kadohan, mijil ta duhnyānaravata, śuddhābresih kadi sphatika rūpanya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tasyā jamboḥ phalaraso nadī bhūtvā janādhipa</l>
. <l n="b">meroḥ pradakṣiṇaṁ kr̥tvā saṁprayāty uttarān kurūn,</l>
350 </lg>
. <p>vvai nikaṅ jambuvr̥kṣa tiba, ya tātəmahān lvah agə̄ṅ kumuliliṅi mahāmeru mapradakṣiṇa lvirnya, tumampuh ry uttarakuru, ya ta mataṅnya nikaṅ vvaṅ riṅ kurudeśa tan kəneṅ lara vəlkaṅ, tan kəneṅ jaramarana sadakala, apan nityaśominum ikaṅ hili nikaṅ jambūphala.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yathā mālyavatah śrṅge drśyate havyavāhanaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">nāmnā saṁbartako nama kalāgnir’ bharatarṣabha,</l>
355 </lg>
. <p>i pārśva nikaṅ vukir mālyavān pva ya ta, ṅkana ta yan hanāpuy umurub tan pantara, inaranan sambartaka.</p>
. <p>
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="22"/>mahārājatasaṁkāśo jāyate tatra mānavaḥ,</p>
. <p>kunaṅ lvir nikaṅ vvaṅ kana, kadi varṇaniṅ pirak salaka.</p>
360 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">sarve ca brahmacarinaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>tuhagaṇa ta yāgave brata brahmacari, sattvikāṅhanakən tapa. salika ri tībra nikaṅ tapa brata kagave denya, mara ta yeṅ suryamaṇḍala, nəm aṅ puluh ivu tahun lavasnyan hana ṅkana, ndatan hilaṅ atah kasattvikanya. ya ta mataṅnyan minduhur mara riṅ śivamaṇḍala. samaṅkana tah muvah lavasnya ṅkana, kadi lavasnyan haneṅ suryamaṇḍala.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
365 <l n="a">dakṣiṇena tu śvetasya nīlasyaivottareṇa ca</l>
. <l n="b">varṣam ramaṇakam nāma tatra jāyanti mānavāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>muvah tiki caritan ikaṅ lorniṅ meru. ikaṅ kakidul deniṅ vukir sveta, kalor deniṅ nīlagiri, yatekīnaranan iṅ ramavarṣa. mahāparipūrṇa ikaṅ vvaṅ kana, lituhayu śuddhajanma, sakta riṅ krīḍācumbana. sapuluh ivu tahun prəmanani huripnya, tan kəna riṅ jaravyadhi salavasnyan ahurip.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
370 <l n="a">dakṣine śr̥ṅginaś caiva svetasyathottareṇa ca</l>
. <l n="b">varṣam hairaṇvataṁ nāma yatra hairaṇvatī nadī,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ ikaṅ varṣa i heranvata, ikaṅ kakidul de nikaṅ vukir śr̥ṅgavan, kalor deniṅ vukir śveta, kumva ta hetu nikan paṅaran hiranvata, ri denyan hanaṅ lvah hiranvah ṅaranya ṅkana.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
375 <l n="a">yakṣabhuta mahārāja dhaninah priyadarśanah,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yapvan ikaṅ janma hana ṅkana, yakṣa kevala buddhinya, apan akveh masnya, sumantan lituhayu, tovin ya mahāśakti kuraṅ prihati.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">āyuḥpramāṇaṁ jīvantu śatāni daśa pañcakāḥ,</l>
380 </lg>
. <p>sevu tahun lavasni huripnya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">uttareṇa tu śr̥ṅgasya samudrānte narādhipa,</l>
. </lg>
385 <p>
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="23"/> ikaṅ varṣa lor iṅ śr̥ṅgavan pva ya ta, makahiṅan uttarasagara, ikaṅ inaranan airāvata ṅuni,</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">na tatra sāryas tapati,</l>
. </lg>
390 <p>tatan apanas tejaniṅ āditya ṅkana;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">na ca jīryanti mānavāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>tatan kəna riṅ jaravyadhīkan vvaṅ kana. kadi varṇaniṅ tunjuṅ varṇanya, kadi gandhaniṅ nīlotpala ambə̄ nika, apan janma saṅkeṅ svarga kavvananya. kunaṅ lavasni huripnya, telu vəlas ivu tahun prəmananya.</p>
395 <p>sājñā haji ! sampun kopapattikarika təkap parameśvara.</p>
. <p>uduh anaku sanjaya! tan dadi tan eṅət svabhavanku yavat vinarah, yeki kaddhr̥tarāṣṭranku, si medhā yan vinarah pisan. kunaṅ pvānakku deyamva: tulusakenta ləbani buddhimu. ikaṅ bhāratavarṣa juga kacaritanya kavəkas kahyunku caritakənamva.</p>
. <p>sājñā haji! maṅka kapva kakuṅ parameśvara. ekatana ta ra hadyan saṅhulun mahiḍəpa.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">pr̥thoś ca rājan vainyasya tathekṣvakoḥ priyaṁ sadā</l>
400 <l n="b">yayāter ambarīṣasya māndhātur nahuṣasya ca,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hana sira mahārāja pr̥thu ṅaran ira ṅuni riṅ pūrvaraja, sira ta prasiddha mapura bhāratavarṣa; tumut ta mahārāja venya, mahārāja ikṣvaku, mahārāja yayati, mahārājambarīsa, mahārāja mandhata, mahārāja nahusa, kapva ta sira pada huvus gumave kottama<del><!-- resp="#edG" -->kəna</del>n ikaṅ deśa. bheda saṅke rika, hana ta sira mahārāja mucukunda ṅaran ira, tumut ta mahārāja śivi mvaṅ mahārāja usicara, mahārajāndala, mahārājanrəga, kapva təlas kr̥takīrti sira kabeh i rikaṅ bhāratavarṣa. tan samaṅka juga pih sājñā haji. hana sira len saṅke sira, kṣatriya mahāpuruṣa sira kabeh.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tat te varṣam pravakṣyāmi yathaśrutam arindama,</l>
405 </lg>
. <p>ika taṅ bhāratavarṣa ṅkana, ya ta pajarakəna patik haji parameśvara, tan papendaha kareṅə̄nya lavan agama təkap patik haji majarajara. nihan ta tambayan iṅ mavaravaraha:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="24"/>mahendro malayaḥ sahyaḥ śuktimān kṣaravān api</l>
410 <l n="b">vindhyaś ca pariyātraś ca saptaite kulaparvatāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hana ya vukir mahendra ṅaranya mvaṅ malaya sahya suktiman ..., kanam vindhya, kapitu pariyatra, ya ta sinaṅguh saptakulaparvata ṅaranya, pinakavukir nikaṅ bhāratavarṣa. nda kadinya juga ika, akveh len saṅke rika, yan vuvusən gatinyāpan vistara dahat.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">āryā mlecchāś ca kesavya tair miśrāḥ puruṣā vibho,</l>
415 </lg>
. <p>ika ta pavvaṅanya, arya lavan mleccha prakrtinya, bheda saṅkeṅ varṇasankara.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">nadīḥ pivati bahulā gaṅgāṁ sindhuṁ sarasvatīm</l>
. <l n="b">godāvarīnarmadam ca bāhudāṁ ca mahānadīm,</l>
420 </lg>
. <p>samaṅkana ta pratyeka nikaṅ lvah, ininum nikaṅ vvaṅ kana, lvirnya: gaṅgā sindhu sarasvatī godavarī narmada bāhuda. len saṅke rika, hana ta lvah satadru ṅaranya, lavan candrabhaga ṅaranya, yamuna drṣadvat vipasa sthulavaluka gomatī togiki rathaspa satakumba sarayu carmanvatī cetravatī payosm gena bheravatī kaverī vegapatī mahendra pipālavatī pulo ghrtavatī vastu suvastu hiranvatī jyotismatī gona tamasa caranasī cintavatī manjula.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">mandakinī vaitaram kokas caiva mahānadī</l>
. <l n="b">suktimatī malabdaś ca tathaiva vrṣabhaṅginī,</l>
425 </lg>
. <p>muvah hana ta lvah mandakinī ṅaranya, vetaram kokanadī suktimatī alabda vrṣabhaṅinī. lavan hana ta lvah lohitya ṅaranya, kuri rṣikanya brahmakanya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">viśvasya mātaraḥ sarvāḥ sarvasvecchamahāphalāḥ</l>
. <l n="b">tatha nadyas tu prakāśāḥ,</l>
430 </lg>
. <p>
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="25"/> ika taṅ lvah samaṅkana kabeh, kapva mahottama mahāpavitra pinakasvabhavanya, pinakebu nikaṅ jagat bhāratavarṣa. akveh mata len saṅke rika, satus ivu lakṣa kotī prəmananya, hanāṅaran, hana tan panaran pinakasvajatinya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">ity etēḥ sarito rājan samākhyātā yathasmr̥tāḥ</l>
435 <l n="b">ata ūrdhvaṁ janapadān nivodha gadato mama,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>nahan ta saṅka nikaṅ lvah, inajarakən patik haji parameśvara, keṅətakəna ta de saṅhulun. ikaṅ janapada ta gumantya varṇanan patik haji. hiḍəpən ta de parameśvara.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">cedimatsyāḥ kuruśāś ca bhojāḥ sindhupulindakāḥ.</l>
440 <l n="b">pāñcalakośalāś caiva kuntayaḥ kāśiśovalāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hana ta cedideśa ṅaranya, i matsya, i kuruśa, i bhoja, i sindhu, i pulinda, i pañcala, i kagi, i sovala. bheda saṅke rika, hana ta i surasena ṅaranya, yugandhara, avanti, vidarbha, anupa, surastra, videha, magaka, balva, aṅga, avaṅga, malla, sakr̥loma, suvesna, valvala, andra, pondra, antargiri, vahirgiri.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">śakā niṣādā niṣadhā gāndhārā darśakās tathā</l>
445 <l n="b">kaśmīrā gargisauvīrās trivargāḥ sarvasenayaḥ.</l>
. </lg>
. <p>len saṅke rika, hana ta janapada, i śaka ṅaranya, i nisada, i nisadha, gandhara, dargaka, kagmīra, garga, sovīra, trigarta, sarvaseni, lavan hana ta ri kukunda ṅaranya, viragraha, madhumatta, valvaja, bhudana, kaccha, gopala, laṅgala, sairandra. nahan ta pinakadi nikaṅ deśa, yan iṅ uttarapatha. kunaṅ yan iṅ dakṣinapatha, nihan pratyekanya:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">drāviḍāḥ keralāḥ procyā vikampā musikās tathā</l>
450 <l n="b">mālavā lavatāś caiva kulindā valkalaiḥ saha,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="26"/> hana ta desa i dravida ṅaranya, i kerala, i procya vikampa mūṣika mālava kulinda, i valkala, bheda saṅke kirāta dhvajini proṣṭha kokuntara kandhaka supava lavala sirala katiki. bheda saṅke rika:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
455 <l n="a">yavanāś ca sakāmbojā dārunā mlecchajātayaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">sakr̥druhāḥ kakaṇṭhāś ca hūnāḥ pārāpataiḥ saha,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hana ta deśa i yava ṅaranya, lavan i kamboja, mlecchajanma dāruṇarūpa sakvehnya, təke sakr̥druha lavan i kakantha mvaṅ ri hūna təke pārātapa. vaneh hana ta ri śūdrabhiru ṅaranya, darada vosika ravakāra ātreya bharadvāja,</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
460 <l n="a">kirātānāṁ ca jātayaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>tuha buru janma nika kabeh.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">uddeśamātrena mayā deśāḥ samkīrtitāḥ prabho,</l>
465 </lg>
. <p>nahan ta tiṅkah nikaṅ desenujarakən patik haji parameśvara, ndan ṅaranya mātra juga ya. tan vinuvus lvirnya sovaṅ-sovaṅ. mahāparimita de nikāmuktiṅ pr̥thivīmaṇḍala, ndatan bəsur atah riṅ kamaviṣaya, tan hana vənaṅ tyāga ri kaḍatvanya. hayva ta tiṅgal, mara tan luṇṭāharəp atambəha bhogaviṣaya. maṅkana pva ya ta:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tasmāt parigrahe bhūmer yatante kūrupāṇḍavāḥ</l>
. <l n="b">sāmna dānena bhedena daṇḍenaiva tu pārthivāḥ,</l>
470 </lg>
. <p>ya ta karih dumeh ranak haji, saṅ korava pāṇḍava, yatna ri karakṣān iṅ pr̥thivīmaṇḍala, apan maṅkana ta karih svabhāvanyaṅ ratu sadeśasadeśa. mataṅnyan kinənan caturūpaya denira ranak haji sira kabeh. mara tan hana parāṅmukhāhyun pratikūla ri sira.</p>
. <p>uḍuh uḍuh ahah, anaku saṅ sañjaya bapa, enak dahat təkaptācarita. trus limpad paṅavruhte rikaṅ bhāratavarṣa. kunaṅ patañaṅkva muvah anaku: pira pramāṇani hurip nikaṅ vvaṅ kana, varah rama ra hadyan saṅhulun, təkeṅ atītānagatavartamana. <pb edRef="#edG" n="27"/>
. </p>
. <p>sājñā haji! tan saṅśaya parameśvara. rəṅvakəna ta vuvus patik haji.</p>
475 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">catvāri bhārate varṣe yugani bhāratarṣabha</l>
. <l n="b">kr̥tatretadvāparaṁ ca puṣyaṁ ca kuruvardhana,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>sājñā haji! ṅke riṅ bhāratavarṣa an aṅucap caturyuga ṅaranya, ikaṅ kr̥ta treta dvaparakali. yathakrama nyasa nika təhər, an maṅkana:</p>
480 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">catvāri ca sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṁ kurusattama</l>
. <l n="b">āyuḥsaṁkhyā kr̥tayuge saṁkhyātā rājasattama,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>pat aṅ ivu tahun lavasniṅ hurip ri bhāratavarṣa ṅuni, ri kalaniṅ kr̥tayuga, anut saṅkhyā niyata nika. mataṅnyan maṅkana:</p>
485 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tathā trīṇi sahasrāṇi tretāyāṁm manujādhipa,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ri kalaniṅ tretayuga pva ya ta, təluṅ ivu tahun pramāṇani hurip nikaṅ vvaṅ kana.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
490 <l n="a">dvāpare dvisahasrāṇi,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>riṅ dvapara pva ya ta, rvaṅ ivu tahun lavasnyan ahurip.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">na pramāṇasthitir hy asti puṣye ’smin bhāratarṣabha</l>
495 <l n="b">garbhasthas ca mriyante ’nye tathā jātā mriyanti ca,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ maṅke kalaniṅ kaliyuga, salah pinramanan hurip nikaṅ vvaṅ ri bhāratavarṣa, apan hana matīṅ daləm vətəṅ, hana mətu mati, hana mati vruh aṅliṅliṅ; evəh ikaṅ tuməke pramāṇanyan kapuruṣayusan. uvahana deni maṅupanyāsa.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">mahābala mahāsattvah prajñaguṇasamanvitah.</l>
500 <l n="b">ajā<supplied reason="omitted"><!-- resp="#edG" -->ya</supplied>ntakētiman<supplied reason="omitted"><!-- resp="#edG" -->to</supplied> munayo vai tapodhanāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ikaṅ vvaṅ riṅ bhāratavarṣa ṅuni riṅ kr̥tayuga, mahāsakti ya, sattvikatisaya ri kaprajñan, viku maṅgəgə̄ tapa juga, lituhayu mahotsaha, sakteṅ dharmakarya, makavatvan satyavacana.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">
505 <pb edRef="#edG" n="28"/>āyuṣmanto mahāvīryā dhanurdharā dharā yudhi</l>
. <l n="b">jāyante kṣatriyāḥ śūrāḥ tretāyāṁ cakravartinaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>riṅ tretayuga pva ya ta, mijil taṅ kṣatriyajanma, paripūrṇa riṅ jīvita, mahāvīrya mahāprabhava, maṅgəgə̄ capa kalaniṅ yuddhakarya, cakravarti śūramanta.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
510 <l n="a">sarve varṇā mahārāja jāyante dvāpare yathā</l>
. <l n="b">mahotsahā mahāvīryāḥ parasparavadhaiṣinaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>dataṅ pvaṅ dvaparayuga, sarvavarṇa tikaṅ maṅdadī samaṅkana: brahmana kṣatriya vaisya śūdra, vīryamanta mahotsaha, ahyun i kapatyan i kapvanya janma.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
515 <l n="a">tejasālpena saṁyuktaḥ krodhanaḥ puruṣo nr̥pa</l>
. <l n="b">lubdhaś cānr̥takaś caiva puṣye jāyati bhārata,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>maṅke pva kalaniṅ kaliyuga, kuraṅ sakti ləvih krodha ikaṅ mānuṣa, lobha təhər ləñok pinakasvabhavanya, gə̄ṅ matsarya, datan bañcana ahaṅkāra parapibuna, saṅkṣepanya sājñā haji:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
520 <l n="a">gunottaraṁ haimavataṁ dvēpare ’smin narādhipa</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ika taṅ vvaṅ i bhāratavarṣa, i dvaparayuga vəkasniṅ guṇādi kaṅ rat təkapnya. ndan iṅətiṅətən ika de parameśvara.</p>
. <p>udu sañjayānaku! siṅgih dahat vuvusmu. vyaktinya marika maṅken katona. kunaṅ pva patañaṅkva muvah: saptadvīpa saptasāgara kəta ikaṅ inujarakənmu ri ṅuni, ndya ta tiṅkahnya? ndo varah ta rama ra hadyan saṅhulun.</p>
. <p>sājñā haji! nihan kramani pvaṅhulun:</p>
525 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">jambūśākakuśakrauñcaḥ śālmaliś ca tathāparaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">gomedaḥ puṣkarākhyaś ca saptadvīpāḥ prakīrtitāḥ</l>
. </lg>
. <p>jambūdvīpa pūrvakaniṅ amilaṅa, ikaṅ huvus cinaritakən patik haji ṅuni tasən; tumut gakadvīpa kugadvīpa kroñcadvīpa salmalidvīpa gomedadvīpa puskaradvīpa. nahan taṅ saptadvīpa pajara patik haji. </p>
530 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="29"/>kṣīrakṣīraṁ dadhisarpir ikṣumadyaṁ parodadhiḥ</l>
. <l n="b">svādūdako paro madyat tasmād dviguṇitaḥ sthitaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
535 <p>kṣīra ṅaran iṅ tasik lavaṇārṇava. kṣīra ṅaran iṅ tasik pəhan. dadhi ṅaran iṅ tasik miñak. pəhan ṅaran iṅ tasik putər. ikṣu ṅaran iṅ tasik airtəbu. madya ṅaran iṅ tasik madirā. bheda saṅke rika, hana ta tasik svādu ṅaranya, vuduk pinakarasanya pradhāna. nahan taṅ saptasamudra samudāya; mvaṅ dviguṇa tekaṅ sakavuri ṅkana i rikaṅ sakaruhun ṅkana riṅ saṅkhyā. yaya karika hiḍəp de parameśvara.</p>
. <p>anaku sañjaya, lvir kasaravuṅan buddhiṅkv i rika. apa tam pajara yathākramanyaṅ saptadvīpan pakatasik ikaṅ saptasāgara? kunaṅ pvan vispaṣṭa panhiḍəpkv i rika, təṅəni tākv i satiṅkahnya.</p>
. <p>sājñā haji! nihan tiṅkahnyan yathākrama:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">lavaṇena samudreṇa parvataḥ parivāritaḥ,</l>
540 </lg>
. <p>ikaṅ jambūdvīpa yeka kinusa deniṅ lavaṇasāgara. ikaṅ kuśadvīpa kinusa deniṅ kṣīrodadhi. i heṅ nika, ikaṅ śākadvīpa kinusa deniṅ dadhisāgara. i heṅ nika, kroñcadvīpa, kinusa denili sarpisamudra. i heṅ nika, śālmalidvīpa, kinusa deniṅ ikṣusāgara. i heṅ nika, gomedadvīpa, kinusa deniṅ madyārṇava. i heṅ nika, puṣkaradvīpa, kinusa deniṅ svādusāgara. nahan ta yathākramani pvaṅkulun, sājñā haji, an yathāsaṅkhya.</p>
. <p>ḍuh maṅka kapvānaku. tan saṅgahən tāku luluy pinacaritakən. ntoh lvirniṅ śākadvīpa varṇanan i tanayanku, saṅka yan həlahəla rama ra hadyan saṅhulun maṅrəṅə̄.</p>
. <p>sājñā haji! vistara dahat ṅaran ika, yan təka ṅkana. saṅkṣepanya: ləkas pavvata pva de patik haji, apan təvas prapañca mucapa prakāranya. mataṅnyan yan hana vanehvaneh, tañakəna parameśvara, yaya patik haji majara.</p>
. <p>katuhvan tānaku yan maṅkana. jagatmaṇḍala marekaṅ <pb edRef="#edG" n="30"/> cinaritakənmu. yonitattvaniṅ sinaṅguh jagat, ya ta pajaramvery aku, yatanyan saṅguhən tattvajña.</p>
545 <p>sājñā haji! tan saṅśaya parameśvara. nihan taṅkəsniṅ pvaṅkulun:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">pañcemāni mahārāja mahābhūtāni saṅgrahāt</l>
. <l n="b">jagatīsthāni sarvāṇi samānyāhur manīṣiṇaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
550 <p>lima ikaṅ pañcamahābhūta, ndan mandəl riṅ pr̥thivī kajaran ika de saṅ mahāpaṇḍita, makanimitta kapupulanya təkap bhaṭṭara jagatkartā. paḍa ta vibhāganira, tan hana sor, tan hana ləvih.</p>
. <p>ndya kari sinaṅguh pañcamahābhūta təkapmu?</p>
. <p>svantahankva vuvusa parameśvara. nihan pratyekanya:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">bhūmir āpas tathā bāyur agnir ākāśam eva ca</l>
555 <l n="b">guṇottarāṇi sarvāṇi teṣāṁ bhūmiḥ pradhānataḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>pr̥thivī āpaḥ teja bāyu ākāśa, samaṅkana pinakavaknyan lima. kapva teka viśeṣa makahetu ginanya sovaṅ-sovaṅ. ndan ika ta kabeh, yan timbaṅvratən, pr̥thivī atah pradhāna ṅaranya. ndya karikaṅ guṇa haneṅ pañcamahābhūta? yan kva liṅa saṅ nātha, nihan pratyekani pvaṅkulun.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">śabdaḥ sparśa<supplied reason="omitted"><!-- resp="#edG" -->ś ca</supplied> <app><lem type="emn">rūpaṁ</lem><rdg wit="#edG">rū<del>pa</del>paṁ</rdg></app> ca</l>
560 <l n="b">raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ,</l>
. <l n="c">catvāro hi guṇā hy apsu</l>
. <l n="d">gandhas tatra na vidyate,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandha kalimanika, ika taṅ guṇa pataṅ siki ṅkana, yeka hana riṅ āpya, tuhun ikaṅ gandha, tan hana ṅkana.</p>
565 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tejaso hi guṇās trayaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ ikaṅ teja, ikaṅ guṇa tigaṅ siki hane rika, tan hana ikaṅ rasa gandha i rika.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
570 <l n="a">śabdaḥ sparśaś ca vai vāyau,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yapvan ikaṅ guṇa haneṅ bāyu, śabda sparśa juga hana ṅkana; tan hanaṅ rūpa rasa gandha hane rika. <pb edRef="#edG" n="31"/>
. </p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
575 <l n="a">ākāśe śabda eva ca,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ ikaṅ ākāśa kevala śabda juga hane ri ya. kunaṅ ikaṅ guṇa samaṅkana,</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">vartante sarvabhūtāni,</l>
580 </lg>
. <p>ya nimitta nikaṅ pañcamahābhūtan hana.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yesu lokāh pratiṣṭhitāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
585 <p>ikaṅ pañcamahābhūta, ya tāndəlan i sinaṅgah jagat, ri vihikana parameśvara.</p>
. <p>məne tah sakarəṅ sañjaya, pradhāna rakvaṅ pr̥thivī rikaṅ pañcamahābhūta. ntoh ndya paton ika təkapmu?</p>
. <p>sājñā haji! kumva hiḍəp patik haji. ikaṅ bhūmin katon, pavakniṅ pañcamahābhūtān paṅdadi ika. ndya tavak nika? svantahankva liṅa saṅ nātha.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">dvividhānīha bhūtāni trasāni sthāvarāṇi ca</l>
590 <l n="b">trasānāṁ trividhā yonir aṇḍasvedajarayujāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>rva bheda nikaṅ bhāva haneṅ bhūmi, sthāvara lavan jaṅgama; tiga saṅkan ikan vijil, aṇḍaja svedaja jarāyuja. aṇḍaja ṅaranya, prāṇi mijil saṅke antiga, svedaja ṅaranya, prāṇi mijil saṅke hariṅət, jarāyuja ṅaranya, prāṇi mijil saṅke garbhavāsa, makasahakāri ariari. maṅkana krama nikaṅ jaṅgaman tiga yoninya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">udbhijjāḥ sthāvarāḥ proktās te ’rtha pañcaiva jayate</l>
595 <l n="b">vrkṣagulmalatāvallyas tvaksārās tr̥ṇajātayaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ ikaṅ sthāvara, udbhijja tattva nika. udbhijja ṅaranya, mijil saṅkeṅ vīja. lima lvirni jātinya, vr̥kṣa gulma latā vallī tvaksāra. vr̥kṣa ṅaranya kayu tan odvad, kayu tan kayukayu lvir nikan tuvuh. latāvallī ṅaranya ikaṅ prasiddha rumambat. tvaksāra ṅaranya salvirniṅ atvas i yava, turuhuṅan i jro. tr̥ṇajāti ṅaranya salvirnin tan karuhuran.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">
600 <pb edRef="#edG" n="32"/>bhūmau hi jāyate sarvaṁ bhūmau sarvaṁ pranaśyati</l>
. <l n="b">bhūmiḥ pratiṣṭha bhutānāṁ bhūmir eva parāyaṇā,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ika ta kabeh, ikaṅ bhūmi kahanan ika kabeh yan vijil, iṅ bhūmi uṅgvanyan hilaṅ. iṅ bhūmi ta ṅaran i kandəlan iṅ sarvabhūtan maṅkana. ya ta mataṅnyan ləvih atah tattvaniṅ bhūmi vəkasan. ndan rasana ta təkap saṅ nātha.</p>
. <p>u siṅgih dahat ikānaku sañjaya. ndan hana takvanakənaṅkva vaneh. ikaṅ apa? svantahan liṅamva. ikaṅ grahatattvacarita, tapva k vəruh vite rika.</p>
605 <p>sājñā haji, yaya patik haji majare rika.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">parimaṇḍalato rājan svarbhānuḥ śrūyate grahaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">yojanānāṁ sahasrāṇi viṣkambho dvādaśāsya tu,</l>
. </lg>
610 <p>makalaṅan saṅ hyaṅ sūrya ṅkane ruhur svargamaṇḍala, rvavəlas ivu yojana atika ārohanira.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">pariṇāhena ṣaṭtriṁśad,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ səṅkərnira, təluṅ puluh nəm ivu yojana.</p>
615 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">ṣaṣṭim āhuḥ śatāny asya vudhāḥ paurāṇikās tathā</l>
. <l n="b">candramās tu sahasrāṇi . . . ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ . . . saṅ maṅaji purāṇa . . . satus nəm aṅ puluh yojana pariṇāhanira. yapvan saṅ hyaṅ vulan, savəlas ivu yojana ārohanira.</p>
620 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">trayas triṁśat tu maṇḍalam,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ maṇḍalanira, təluṅ puluh təluṅ ivu yojana.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
625 <l n="a">sa rāhuś chādayaty etau yathākālaṁ mahattayā,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>an maṅkana pramāṇanira. ndatan katutupan sira de nikaṅ rāhu, yan təka nikaṅ grahakāla; maṅajarakən gə̄ṅ nikaṅ rāhu kaliṅan ika.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">candrādityau mahārāja saṁkṣepaṇa udāhr̥tau,</l>
630 </lg>
. <p>nahan ta saṅkṣepani kajaran saṅ hyaṅ candrāditya, i vruha parameśvara. <pb edRef="#edG" n="33"/>
. </p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tasmād āśvasa kauravya putraṁ duryodhanaṁ prati</l>
635 <l n="b">śrutvedaṁ bharataśreṣṭha bhūmiparva manonugam,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>maṅkana pva ya ta, mataṅnyan tāyva vismr̥ti parameśvara, pirəṅvana ta ranak haji, mahārāja duryodhana, riṅ bhūmiparvacarita, apan kapaṅguhan i manahniṅ vvaṅ ruməṅə̄ ikeṅ kathā. lavan ta vaneh kottamanya:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yaḥ śrnoti mahīpālaḥ parvanīdaṁ yatabrataḥ</l>
640 <l n="b">prīyante pitaras tasya tathaiva prapitāmahāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yan hana vvaṅ ruməṅə̄ ikiṅ kathācaritaparva, tuhagana ta yābratāṅkən parvanī, byakta tuṣṭātmaka saṅ pitara nika, təka riṅ kaki puyut, nitya sukhātmaka. vaneh:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">śrīmān bhavati rājanyaḥ siddhārthaḥ sādhusaṁmataḥ,</l>
645 <l n="b">āyurbalaṁ ca vīryaṁ ca tasya tejaś ca vardhate,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>moghāriṅ tekaṅ śrī i rikaṅ vvaṅ tuhaganāṅrəṅə̄ rikeṅ bhūmisaṅkathā, vənaṅ aṅudanakəna dhanapuṇya riṅ rat, siddhaprayojana, kinasədəpan i kapvanya, ṅuniveh saṅ sajjana, dīrghāyuṣa mahāśakti, vīryamanta vr̥ddhi tejatejanya. byakta ya tan dadi mithyā hiḍəp patik haji.</p>
. <p>uḍu bhāgya tānaku sañjaya! yayāku mratyakṣakən ikaṅ sarvabhāvan maṅkana, apan ko prasiddha pinakajñānamataṅku, kaliṅanya: hayva ta ko tan lot i rikaṅ satinakvanakənku.</p>
. <p>an maṅkana liṅ mahārāja dhr̥tarāṣṭra, harṣa de nika kendriyan saṅ sañjaya. pira kunaṅ antajinya, ākāra sapuluh vəṅi, manambah ta saṅ sañjaya, atəhər anaṅis, hañar ḍataṅ saṅkeṅ kurukṣetra. majar i harəp mahārāja dhr̥tarāṣṭra, liṅ nira:</p>
650 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">kakudaḥ sarvayodhānāṁ dhāma sarvadhanuṣmatām</l>
. <l n="b">śaratalpagataḥ so ’dya śete kurupitāmahāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>sājñā haji! patik haji si sañjaya ḍataṅ sumambah pādukā parameśvara. sira rāma ra hadyan saṅhulun, bhagavān <pb edRef="#edG" n="34"/> bhīṣma, saṅ pinakottuṅganiṅ yodha riṅ lagi, sira saṅ pinakaviśeṣaniṅ vruh rini dhanurveda, sira ta təlas karahatan kaparājaya, karahatan deniṅ śikhaṇḍi, səḍaṅ maṅhiḍəp saṅsāra sira maṅke gumuliṅ śaratalpa,</p>
655 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">jagāmāstam ivādityaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kady āditya meh sumurupa gatinira maṅko, atyanta kasyasihnira rama haji.</p>
. <p>i, mapa liṅmu sañjaya? karahatan bhagavān kaki kumva ko? ḍu namaḥ sivāya! hilaṅ ka pva saṅ pinakataṅkisniṅ kurukula. prāṇāntika ka pva saṅ pinakādidevaniṅ duryodhana. atyanta dahat bvat nikaṅ lare hatiṅku maṅke. apa mūla nikaṅ kalahan, apa kramanya deniṅ aṅdani, mataṅnyan tan hana pratisara rumakṣe sira? lvir asambhava dahat paṅiḍəpkv i tan pamaṅpannira. ntoh masyasih tānaku, viti təkapmv avaravarah, yatanya k vihikana ri padārtha nirar karahatan riṅ samara.</p>
660 <p>tan saṅśaya parameśvara, mavaravaraha patik haji. nihan prathamarəmba nikaṅ laga.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">teṣv anīkeṣu sarveṣu vyūdheṣu ca vidhānataḥ</l>
. <l n="b">duryodhano mahārāja duḥśāsanam athābravīt,</l>
. </lg>
665 <p>təlas atiṅkah dinanan ikaṅ vīrasenāyodha, pinatah titah nikaṅ byūha, i rika ta ranak haji mahārāja duryodhana, mujar i saṅ duḥśāsana, liṅ nira: antən i ṅhulun saṅ duḥśāsana, konakəna ikaṅ ratha pahayun, kənana sapaniṣkara, uṅgvananiṅ kakinta bhagavān gaṅgāsuta, lavan ikaṅ vadva śūra rumakṣe sira. śīghrakən ta təkapta, hayva vyālambita.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">nātaḥ kāryataraṁ manye r̥te bhīṣmasya rakṣaṇāt,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>tan hana vih yogya kārya vaneh, yan lena saṅke karakṣaṇa de bhagavān devabrata, apan sirenubhayan tāməjahanaṅ pāṇḍava. maṅkana paṅuddeśa mahārāja duryodhana. <pb edRef="#edG" n="35"/> i rikaṅ sakatambesuk pva ya ta, ri pūrvaka nikaṅ laga, dinanan tekaṅ vatək ratu sāmanta, tiniṅkah soṅgvana nika sovaṅ-sovaṅ; ghūrṇita tekaṅ śaṅkha bherī mr̥daṅga, masaṅgyani lavan pahyaniṅ bala peka sāmānya, sinahakāryan deniṅ śabdaniṅ mattasāmaja lavan kuda, mvaṅ pasiṅhanādaniṅ vīrayodha. mapa ta ivirnyan abra sinaṅ savayava nikaṅ təgal kurukṣetra deni haləpniṅ sarvāyudha mvaṅ sarvabhūṣaṇa? maṅkana ta ri saṅ pāṇḍava, tatan pahiṅan kadbhuta nikaṅ senāpratisenā caturāṅgabala, iniṅətiṅət pva gatinyan səḍəṅ mahārəpharəpan.</p>
670 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yugānte <supplied reason="omitted"><!-- resp="#edG" -->sa</supplied>mavetau dvau</l>
. <l n="b">sāgaram ivādr̥śyata,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>an kadi ta ya tasik rvaṅ siky apagut lavan rovaṅnya, kālaniṅ mahāpralaya.</p>
675 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">dvidhābhūta ivāditya</l>
. <l n="b">udaye pratyadr̥śyata,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hanan kady ādityāparva kālaniṅ udaya, ri denyan prakāśa dahat dilah nikaṅ sarvāstra ri kālanyan maṅkana.</p>
680 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">samānīya mahīpālān idaṁ vacanam abravīt,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hinə̄makən tekaṅ ratu sāmanta de bhagavān bhīṣma, pinitəkətan ira riṅ nayopāya, mvaṅ rikaṅ kṣatriyadharmaśāsana.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
685 <l n="a">idaṁ vah kṣatriyā dvāraṁ svargāyāpāvr̥taṁ mahāt</l>
. <l n="b">gacchadhvaṁ tena kramasya brahmaṇaś ca salokatām,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>sojar ra hadyan saṅhulun kita kabeh, sakveh saṅ vatək kṣatriya mahāpuruṣa kabeh, yeki babahan məṅa təkeṅ svarga ṅaranya, ikiṅ samarakarya, tutən iṅ vvaṅ kadi kita mahāvīra, yatanyat paṅguhaṅ indraloka lavan brahmaloka. hayva ta kita tan utsāhe karəmbaniṅ raṇakriyā.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
690 <l n="a">adharmaḥ kṣatriyasyaiṣa yad vyādhimaraṇaṁ gr̥he</l>
. <l n="b">yad ayonidhanam yāti so ’sya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="36"/> tan dharmaniṅ kṣatriya kəta ikaṅ maty alara hane ry umahnya, kunaṅ ikaṅ pəjah i təṅahniṅ raṇāṅga, ya ika mahāviseṣaniṅ kadi kita mahākṣatriya ṅaranya.</p>
695 <p>maṅkana de bhagavān bhīṣmāgave protsāha riṅ senavīra, mataṅnyan maṅka tāruhunruhunan. masə̄ sakvehniṅ ratu maṅjurv i korava kabeh, tatan vuvusən kvehni vāhananya sovaṅ-sovaṅ, mvaṅ sañjatanya, lavan haləp nikaṅ bhūṣaṇa sinaṇḍaṅnya, ṅuniveh kvehni vadvanya riṅ saratusaratu. kunaṅ bhagavān bhīṣma, hana sirāṅadəg i samīpaniṅ korava, makadhvajaṅ tāla kāñcana rukmamaya, apan sira pinakasenāpati rikaṅ kāla. pira ta lvir nika pratyeka nikaṅ pinakādiyodha? śrutāyudhaḥ citrasena viviṅśati śalya bhūriśrava, makapuraḥsaraṅ droṇaputra, samaṅkana tekaṅ inabhimata rumakṣa bhagavān devabrata. kunaṅ vadva ḍaṅ hyaṅ droṇa, satus ivu pramāṇanya, makadhvajaṅ kamaṇḍalu kāñcana. mahārāja duryodhana makadhvajaṅ nāga manik suprakāśa, iniriṅ deniṅ ratu poṇḍra kaliṅga kāmboja sudakṣiṇa kṣemadanva. yapvan ḍaṅ hyaṅ kr̥pācārya, vr̥ṣabha taṇḍanira, makapaṅarəp sakveh ramāgadha; sākṣāt megha riṅ māghamāsa lvir nikaṅ vadva manimbaṅi sira. kunaṅ mahārāja jayadratha, varāha pinakataṇḍanira, valuṅ ivu kvehni gajahnira, nəm aṅ ayuta kvehni kudanira, limaṅ ivu kvehni rathanira. yapvan mahārāja bhagadatta, liman ika vāhananira, iniriṅ deniṅ vindānuvinda, tumut i lampah mahārāja ketumān. saṅkṣepa nikaṅ vadva haneṅ korava, savəlas akṣohiṇī, ikaṅ prasiddha tumutakən saṅsə̄ bhagavān bhīṣma.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">dhr̥tarāṣṭrasyānīkasya dr̥ṣtvā vyūhāni pāṇḍavaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">abhyabhāṣata dharmātmā dharmarājo dhanañjayam,</l>
. </lg>
700 <p>ri təlas saṅ korava kr̥tabyūha vadvanira, mulat ta mahārāja yudhiṣṭhira. ya ta hetu nirar pojar i saṅ dhanañjaya, <pb edRef="#edG" n="37"/> liṅ nira: antən i ṅhulun laki saṅ arjuna, təlas abyūha saṅ korava, huvus atiṅkah mahāyodha sāṅgarakṣaka. kumva ta deyanta. t aləkas t agave byūha, kumənakəna pajar i śāstra bhagavān vr̥haspati, apan vənaṅ rakvaṅ akəḍik maṅlavan akveh, sabarinyan kəna deniṅ aṅdani byūha. mapa taṅ enaka maṅke?</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">sūcīmukham anīkaṁ syād alpānāṁ bāhubhiḥ saha</l>
. <l n="b">asmākaṁ ca tathā sainyam alpīyaḥ sutarāṁ paraiḥ,</l>
. </lg>
705 <p>sūcīmukha ta pva gəlarən iṅ vadva makəḍik, maṅlavan akveh, apan atiśaya kvehni kasorni balanta deni vadva nikaṅ musuh. empəna simpən ta pva hiḍəpni ṅhulun, i rikeṅ byūha ike, danana ta de ny antən i ṅhulun.</p>
. <p>sājñā haji! tan saṅgahana maṅpaṅ patik haji ri sojar ra hadyan saṅhulun. kumva tekaṅ damələn patik haji byūha: hana ta bajrabyūha ṅaranya, təlas dinaməl deni rama ra hadyan saṅhulun bhaṭṭārendra. ndan atyanta tah kadurjayanya ri hiḍəp patik haji, tan kəneniṅgut iṅ ulahulah. təkvan pvan hana rantən haji ārya bhīmasena, pakaśaraṇaniṅ vadva huvus tinaṅkah. byakta pratihata hiḍəp patik haji parameśvara.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">na hi so ’sti pumāṁl loke yaḥ sakrodhaṁ vr̥kodaram</l>
. <l n="b">draṣṭum atyugrakarmāṇaṁ viṣaheta nararṣabham,</l>
710 </lg>
. <p>hana ta karih vvaṅ mahāpuruṣa ṅke riṅ loka, vənaṅa śaktya mapaga ri vr̥kodara səḍaṅ krodha? maku juga patik hajin tras taṅ musuh de rantən haji.</p>
. <p>an maṅkana liṅ saṅ dhanañjaya. atəhər lumampah aṅdani byūha. sampun enak pva katiṅkahan ikaṅ vadva senāpratisenā, prasama maṅsə̄ ta ya lavan ratu sāmanta, kadi hiliniṅ jāhnavī kahiḍəpanya, makagrakesarārya bhīmasena, nakulasahadeva, dhr̥ṣṭaketu, dhr̥ṣṭadyumna, iniriṅ deniṅ yodha mukhya, lavan prabhadratha, tumut taṅ śikhaṇḍi, makaṅgarakṣa saṅ arjuna, makasahakāri yuyudhāna, mvaṅ yudhāmanyūttamoja. kunaṅ mahārāja <pb edRef="#edG" n="38"/> yudhiṣṭhira, hane madhya nikaṅ byūha sira madulur mahārāja drūpada, virāṭa, kapvāhavan ratha sira katiga. piraṅ koṭi kunaṅ ikaṅ vīrabala padātinira, bheda saṅkeṅ liman səḍaṅ madagandhacalita. luməkas ta saṅ bhīmasenāṅrəmuk aṅrəmək vadvaniṅ musuh. nora vənaṅ mulat ṅaranya, sakveh nikaṅ kaharəp de saṅ vr̥kodara, təkvan ikaṅ bajramukhabyūha, sarvatomukha sakāmakāma gatinya. mataṅnyan tan kāvāran pamuk saṅ bhīmasena, dadi saṅke harəp saṅke iriṅan, mataṅnyan syuh jarjarīka ikaṅ koravabala. tapva yan valəs. maṅsə̄ ta saṅ korava katəkan surupniṅ āditya. maluvaran tekaṅ praṅ vəkasan.</p>
. </div>
. <!-- section !-->
715 <div type="section" n="3">
. <p>i rikaṅ sakatambe muvah ri kapiṅ rvaniṅ laga inisukan tikaṅ raṇakārya. i rika ta yan sadr̥śa deniṅ aṅdani bala, kapva hinatyan sinubaddhakən pakəkəsnya. manuṅgaṅ iṅ liman mahārāja duryodhana samaṅkana, inastutiniṅ sūta māgadha vaitālika, pinayuṅan śvetachattra kanakadaṇḍa. tatan adoh saṅ ārya śakuni saṅke saṅ duryodhana makaparivr̥taṅ vatək gāndhārapārvatīyagaṇa. maṅkana tah bhagavān bhīṣma salvirniṅ śveta pinakaləṅkaranira, təkeṅ kavaca dhanuḥ makuṭa kiratbāhu pādarakṣa, astam ikaṅ payuṅ pinakāvaraṇa nira: śuddha kadi vərəhniṅ gaṅgā katonanya saṅke kadohan, ṅuniveh tikaṅ kuda humir śakaṭanira, kadi haṅśa katiṅhalanya. maṅdani ta bhagavān bhīṣma, tiṅkahniṅ balakramanya:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">sāgram śatasahasraṁ tu nāgānāṁ tavabhārata,</l>
. <l n="b">
720 <del><!-- resp="#edG" -->nāgenan tav bharanta</del>nāge nāge rathaśataṁ śatam aśvā rathe rathe,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>satus ivu piṇḍa nikaṅ liman i saṅ korava, ikaṅ liman sasikisasiki ṅkana iniriṅ deniṅ ratha satus, ikaṅ ratha sasiki ṅkana iniriṅ deniṅ kuda satus. <pb edRef="#edG" n="39"/>
. </p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
725 <l n="a">anv aśvā daśa dhānuṣkā dhānuṣkaṁ śatavarmiṇah,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ikaṅ kuda sakasasiki ṅkana iniriṅ deniṅ panah sapuluh; ikaṅ panah sakasasiki ṅkana iniriṅ deniṅ atilañjaṅ satus. maṅkana deniṅ aṅdani caturaṅgabala aṅkən sarahinasarahina; gəlarniṅ devagandharva rakva ṅaran ika; pratidina ta bhagavān bhīsma pinakagrasenāpati; an maṅkana pratisubaddhani de saṅ koravāṅdani byūha.</p>
. <p>prihatin ta manah mahārāja yudhiṣṭhira; tan popāyan tan pakacidran ri hiḍəpnira i ri ya. mataṅnyar pojar i saṅ arjuna, liṅ nira:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
730 <l n="a">akṣobhyo ’yam abhedyo ’yaṁ bhīṣmeṇāmitrakarṣiṇā</l>
. <l n="b">kalpitaḥ śāstradr̥ṣṭena vidhinā bhūmivarcasā,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>antən iṅ hulun saṅ arjuna, bapa, durjayātisaya ikeṅ byūha daməl bhagavān bhīṣma; tan kavənaṅ vinuk, tan kavənaṅ tinampuh, sotan ta sihapan nītiniṅ vruh riṅ vidhikrama katon iṅ śāstra niyatanya denira. ndya tikaṅ yogya paṅlavanante ri ya? mapa ta deniṅ vvaṅ lumagaṅ śatru yāvat maṅkana kramanya ?</p>
. <p>sājñā haji, apa yan kasaṅsayakəna karih? ṅke tikan sāraṅ manah prajña ṅaranya ri dadyaniṅ makəḍik maṅalahakənaṅ akveh. kumva pih kāraṇanya; aṅrəṅə̄ varavarah bhagavān nārada patik haji. bhaṭṭāra brahmā rakva sira majar i saṅ vatək devatā, makādi saṅ hyaṅ indra, ṅuni ya praṅ iṅ devāsura, liṅnira rakva:</p>
735 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">na tathā balavīryābhyāṁ jayanti vijigīṣavah</l>
. <l n="b">yathā satyānr̥śaṁsyābhāṁ dharmeṇaivodyamena ca,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>anaku saṅ vatək devatā kita kabeh, yat ahyun umayatnaṅ daitya, tan vənaṅ ikaṅ balavīrya, yan ya paṅayāya, tan paḍa lavan kaśaktin iṅ kasatyan mvaṅ kopaśaman, yan pinakasādhana; astam yan dharma pakamaṅgalan, avas juga mənaṅṅ vvaṅ riṅ raṇa təkap nika. tiṅgalakəna <pb edRef="#edG" n="40"/> taṅ karmānr̥ta mvaṅ kalobhan; hayva pakambək si kahaṅkāra ta ri kālaniṅ laga; paramārthanya:</p>
740 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yato dharmas tato jayaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>sabarinyan gavayaṅ dharma ta pva, niyata kitāṅjayakən yāvat maṅkana. maṅkana rakva liṅ bhaṭṭāra brahmā rikana. varavarah bhagavān nārada ya tika kapagəhakəna ri hiḍəp patik haji. dharma juga gegə̄n de parameśvara, yayālaha nikaṅ musuh de haji!</p>
. <p>maṅkana pitutur saṅ arjuna ri mahārāja yudhiṣṭhira. muvah ta sirākvan aṅdanana byūha; i madhyaniṅ senā saṅ arjuna mvaṅ saṅ śikhaṇḍi pratisara rika. kunaṅ pinakalambuṅnya ri kivan saṅ bhīmasena mvaṅ dhr̥ṣṭadyumna pinakarakṣaka ṅkana; yapvan ikaṅ paṅiriṅnya ri təṅən yuyudhāna sātyaki pinakaṅgarakṣa. mahārāja yudhiṣṭhira manuṅgaṅi ratha kāñcana sira, śināntyan iṅ brāhmaṇa mvaṅ vatək mahārṣi sira, ināśīrvāda riṅ jayamaṅgala. mataṅnyar pagave dhanapuṇya pamaləsnira. atəhər umaṅsə̄ marek i harəp saṅ korava. i rika ta bhagavān bhīṣman pasiṅhanāda, anyup śaṅkhan mandəha riṅ vatək koravabala. maṅkana tah mahārāja yudhiṣṭhira ikaṅ śaṅkha si vijaya tinyupnira. kunaṅ ikaṅ śaṅkha tinyup saṅ vr̥kodara si poṇḍra ṅaranya kakhyāti. saṅ nakula sahadeva sira si sughoṣa maṇipuṣpa ṅaran ikaṅ śankha tinulupnira. ṅuniveh saṅ arjuna mvaṅ mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa si pañcajanya mvaṅ si devadatta vineh nirāsraṅa svara. təka ta mahārāja kāśirāja mvaṅ saṅ śikhaṇḍi dhr̥ṣṭadyumna sātyaki mvaṅ ghaṭotkacābhimanyu təke saṅ pañcakumāra makādi mahārāja drupada kapvānulup śaṅkha sira kabeh. mapa ta lvirnya? na pratidhvanimaya ikaṅ ākāśa lavan pr̥thivītala. i rikan kadīnuñjem iṅ curiga hati nikaṅ koravabala. vahv asannikarṣa tah tampuh nikaṅ sarvāyudha, tumiṅhal ta saṅ dhanañjaya ri vasthā saṅ korava; apa kunaṅ manah nira? kinon ira ta mahārāja krṣna umavekaṅ ratha ri pantajyan ikaṅ koravabala mvaṅ pāṇḍavabala. ḍataṅ nire pantaran iṅ malaga, enak ta denira <pb edRef="#edG" n="41"/> tumiṅhal i saṅ rovaṅa nirāṅayva kaśūran kabeh. ndan lvir manastāpa koluyan citta sira, kapənuhan kāruṇya citta mvaṅ məlasarep. matanṅyar pojar i mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa, liṅ nira:</p>
745 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">dr̥ṣṭvemaṁ svajanam kr̥ṣṇa yuyutsuṁ samupasthitam</l>
. <l n="b">sīdanti mama gātrāni mukhaṁ ca pa<supplied reason="omitted"><!-- resp="#edG" -->ri</supplied>śuṣyati,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ra hadyan saṅhulun mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa, tan vvaṅ vaneh ta karih saṅ rovaṅaniṅ apraṅa, katon ta sira kabeh, kapva kulavarga, bapa kaki paman paṅajyan guru vvaṅ sanak kaka anak putu parnahnya vaneh, bheda saṅke rama tuha mitra kula bhartiti. amogha lumay iki śarīrani ṅhulun an ton sira kabeh, kasatan aṅəlih ike mukhaniṅ pinakaṅhulun, tatan pasaṅkan kətər nikeṅ sarvasandhi, ndanda tumibakən śarīranya ikaṅ gaṇḍevadhanuḥ saṅke taṅan iṅ pinakaṅhulun, apayapan tan pahati kahilaṅan citta patik haji.</p>
750 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">na <supplied reason="omitted"><!-- resp="#edG" -->ca</supplied> śreyo <app><lem type="emn">’nupaśyāmi</lem><rdg wit="#edG">’nu<del>na</del>paśyāmi</rdg></app></l>
. <l n="b">hatvā svajanam āhave</l>
. <l n="c">na kāṅkṣe vijayaṁ kr̥ṣṇa</l>
. <l n="d">na ca rājyaṁ sukhāni ca,</l>
755 </lg>
. <p>riṅ kapanekaṅ inak ambək kabhuktya deniṅ pinakaṅhulun, yan təlas məjahanaṅ kulavandhu ṅke riṅ palagan? mataṅnyan pva, mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa, tan ahyun ṅhulun i kavijayan, tan kapeṅin iṅ rājyavibhava. apa kāryaniṅ bhoga lavan jīvita yan prāṇaghātakāṅhilaṅakən kuṭumba? iṅ asih tr̥ṣṇā maṅaveśe hatiniṅ pinakaṅhulun! ndyaṅ sukha, ndyaṅ manah tuṣṭa? byaktaṅ kapāpan jugaṅ kapaṅgiha! ndya taṅ vidhi, ndya taṅ prāyaścitta tumulaka doṣaniṅ madaməl kṣaya kula? yeki sākṣāt adharmakaraṇa ṅaran ika, apan niyatāṅhilaṅakən piṇḍodakakriyā. hana kambekniṅ pinakaṅhulun:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yadi mām apratīkāram aśastraṁ śastrapāṇayaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">dhārtarāṣṭrā raṇe hanyus tan me kṣemataraṁ bhavet,</l>
760 </lg>
. <p>saṅ koravāṅgəgə̄ sarvāyudha, ṅhulun tan valəs, apan tan pasañjata, yatanyan pəjahaṅ pinakaṅhulun ṅke riṅ <pb edRef="#edG" n="42"/> raṇamaṇḍala, hana ṅganya inakani ṅhulun. ta kariṅ mava kaṅ pātaka, mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa. tan saṅgahən patik haji mithyākṣatriya. atiṅgala rikeṅ gaṇḍevā mvaṅ śaravarāstra si dhanañjaya.</p>
. <p>ḍū namu bhaṭṭāra, namaḥ śivāya! maṅka ka pva prāya saṅ arya phalguṇa? apa nimittaniṅ maṅko, bapa, katəkan mala? apa kāraṇaniṅ piṇḍah riṅ svabhāvanya?</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">mā klaivyaṁ gaccha kaunteya naitat tvayy upapadyate</l>
765 <l n="b">kṣudraṁ hr̥dayadaurbalyaṁ tyaktvā tiṣṭha paraṁtapa,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>mantəna rakryan t apyuhan. tan dadiṅ kadi saṅ ārya makambək kṣudracitta si gə̄ṅ prihati. vaṅunən ta pvaṅ buddhi kakṣatriyan de rakryan, yatanyan tan ilaṅa svarga lavan yaśanta.</p>
. <p>sājñā haji mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa, siṅgih taṅguh parameśvara. kunaṅ apan kasaputan deniṅ citta kārpaṇya patik haji, ya ta hetuniṅ mūḍha lupa riṅ dharmasmaraṇa. ndatan hana mārga patik hajin paṅguhaṅ ayu bheda saṅke varānugraha ra hadyan saṅhulun.</p>
. <p>uḍu aum aum, bapa saṅ āryārjuna! apa pva pakənani ṅhulun denta, ya tan popayoga pituture kita riṅ hitāvasāna?</p>
770 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">aśocyaḥ hy anuśoca tvaṁ prajñāvādaś ca bhāṣase</l>
. <l n="b">gatāsūn agatāsūn vā nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>tan śuci saṅ ārya yan karakətan prihati. jñāna nirmala ka pvājarakəna. mataṅnyan maṅkana: apan ikaṅ mati lavan ahurip kapveka tan kinakuṅakən de saṅ vihikan. apa dumeh sira maṅkana? nihan liṅ saṅ hyaṅ agama:</p>
775 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">dehino ’smin yathā dehe kaumāraṁ yauvanaṁ jarā <pb edRef="#edG" n="43"/>
. </l>
. <l n="b">tathā dehāntaraprāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati,</l>
. </lg>
780 <p>ikaṅ janma ṅaranya ri səḍaṅnyan paśarīra maṅke kararayan kayovanan si tuha mara kapaṅguh de nika, riṅ janmāntara tuvi yaya tah samaṅkana kapaṅguh, tatan hana papahinya. maṅkana pva tattvanya. mataṅnyan tan alara tah ri təkaniṅ pati hurip. tarima taṅ panas tis, kəlakən si sukha duḥkha, paḍakən ikaṅ surasa lavan virasa.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ</l>
. <l n="b">ubhayor api dr̥ṣṭo ’ntas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ,</l>
. </lg>
785 <p>kumva mara pratuhunya: yavat tan hana kətikan tan hana, yāvat ta hana kətikan hana, katonan ika kalih de saṅ vruh iṅ tattva. kumva saṅsipta nikaṅ vuvus:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">antavanta ime dehā nityaproktāḥ śarīriṇaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">vināśino ’prameyasya yasmād yudhyasva bhārata,</l>
. </lg>
790 <p>iti śarīra ṅaranya makantaṅ hilaṅ svabhāva nika, kojaran ika juga ika si nitya, apayapan yāvat mavak ikan pabalik ta ya, ndatan kənenilagan yan təkani patinya. mataṅnyan saṅ ārya dhanañjaya, apraṅa ta pva kita, apan sampun kinavruhan viṣaya nikaṅ pati lavan hurip. delə̄n təmən kəta de saṅ ārya:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">ya enam vetti hantāram yaś cainaṁ manyate hataṁ</l>
. <l n="b">ubhau tau nābhijānītāṁ nāyam hanti na hanyate,</l>
. </lg>
795 <p>nyaṅ vvaṅ manaṅgah jaya i riki lavan ikaṅ vvaṅ anaṅgah kaparājaya i riki, ika ta kalih paḍāku ri pakṣanya, ika tatan niyata tuhunya, apan dadi kaṅ sinaṅgah jayālah tan paṅgarit mātra, maṅkana taṅ sinaṅguhnya kaparājaya, dadi ya mənaṅ tan katumpalan, hiṅanyan tan kinaniścayan ikaṅ pati lavan hurip panonana.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">nainaṁ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṁ dahati pāvakaḥ,</l>
. <l n="b">na cainaṁ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
800 <p>
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="44"/> dadi kaṅ sañjata tan vənaṅ anugəl, dadi kətaṅ apuy tan paṅgəsəṅi, dadi kaṅ vvaṅ tan panələsi, dadi kaṅ aṅin tan pataṅən. kunaṅ pi si deyaniṅ kadi kita:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">svadharmam eva cāvekṣya</l>
. <l n="b">na vikalpitum arhati</l>
805 <l n="c">dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyo ’nyat</l>
. <l n="d">kṣa<supplied reason="omitted"><!-- resp="#edG" -->tri</supplied>yasya na <app><lem type="emn">vidyate</lem><rdg wit="#edG"><del>va</del>vidyate.</rdg></app>,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>svadharmaniṅ kadi kita tah vava rəṅə̄hən. hayva sumandehaṅ halahayu, apayapan tan hana vih dharma yukti gavayən deniṅ kadi kita kṣatriya, yan lena saṅkeṅ dharmayuddhakarma. ya tan gavayaṅ dharmayuddhakārya, biṣamaṅ kīrti katiṅgala, kapaṅguh pāpa magə̄ṅ, niyata ginuyuguyu de saṅ mahāvīra, upətən deniṅ siṅhapuruṣa. ikaṅ ulah tininda deniṅ śūrajana, yeka duḥkha mahābhāra ṅaranya riṅ rat. pagəhi taṅ jñāna kumva:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
810 <l n="a">hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṁ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm</l>
. <l n="b">tasmād uttiṣṭha kaunteya yuddhāya kr̥taniścayaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yan matya kitāvas amaṅguh svarga; jaya kunaṅ kita, byakta kita mamukti riki pr̥thivīmaṇḍala. mataṅnyan ləkas ta kita kumaniścaye yuddhakārya, apan kapva lābhaṅ jaya kaparājaya. təlas marək mara buddhinta riṅ sāṁkhya yoga. ikaṅ apa? ikaṅ buddhi vyavasāyātmaka, apan aṅhiṅ rakva ika ləvih yan ṅke riṅ loka, yāvat buddhi maṅekānten svadharmakārya; gəgə̄nta ta pvaṅ ambək maṅkana, luput niyatanta riṅ karmabandhana. nihan ta paramārthanya:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
815 <l n="a">karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadā cana</l>
. <l n="b">mā karmaphalahetubhr̥d mā te saṅgo svakarmaṇi,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ikādhikāranta riṅ sarvakārya, pisaniṅu kətika tan paphala? kunaṅ pih deyanta: hayva juga kitāgave hala, hayva jənək riṅ tan yukti kāryan, yoga təka gəgə̄nta, tumiṅgalakənaṅ <pb edRef="#edG" n="45"/> janasaṁgama. aparan tan yoga ṅaranya? svantahan liṅanta:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
820 <l n="a">siddhyasiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṁ yogau ucyate,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>si samatā ri sor lavan ləvih yeka yoga ṅaranya. hana ta yan kva liṅnya vaneh:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">śrutivipratipannā te yadā sthāsyatī niścitā</l>
825 <l n="b">yamādāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasi,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yapvan ta karəṅə̄ tapvaṅ śabda təkapni taliṅanta, niścayāpagəh yuga buddhinta, tan calāṅgə̄ṅ samadhi, yapvan maṅkana, kapaṅguh ikaṅ yoga təkapta.</p>
. <p>ḍuḥ aum aum, bapa mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa, sampun kahiḍəp ika de patik aji. kunaṅ pva muvah pajara parameśvara ri pinakaṅhulun, ikaṅ sinaṅgah lakṣaṇaniṅ mahāpuruṣa juga, anuṅ tuhutuhunya, de ra hadyan saṅhulun mavaraha.</p>
. <p>ḍu maṅka ta pva kaharəp saṅ āryārjuṇa; majara ṅhulun yan maṅkana kaharəpta, nihan ta lvir nika:</p>
830 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yadā saṁharate kāmān sarvān pārtha manogatān</l>
. <l n="b">atmany evātmanā tuṣṭaḥ sthitaə prajñaḥ sa ucyate,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hana ta vvaṅ tus iṅ sarvakāma, lvirniṅ paṅavaśakən manah kinavaśakənya, tinuṣṭakənya tāvaknya makasādhanāvaknya, ika taṅ vvaṅ maṅkana, yeka sinaṅgah prajña ṅaranya. kunaṅ yan maṅke:</p>
835 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">ḍuḥkheṣv anudvignamanāh sukheṣu vigataspr̥haḥ,</l>
. <l n="b">vītarāgabhayakrodhaḥ sthitadhīr munir ucyate,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hana ta vvaṅ tan alaran katəkan duḥkha mahābhāra, tan harṣan pamaṅguh sukhātiśaya, kinatayan iṅ rāga bhaya krodha, apagəh ta yeṅ buddhi; yapvan hana vvaṅ maṅkana, sira ta mahāpuruṣa samaṅkana. nahan ta rakva pravr̥ttinira.</p>
840 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">viṣayā vinivartante nirāhārasya dehinaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">rasavarjaṁ raso py asya paraṁ dr̥ṣṭva nivartate,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>
845 <pb edRef="#edG" n="46"/> hana ta sirāṅgə̄ṅ brata nirāhāra, kevala dinohan ira jugaṅ viṣaya, uminakakən ikaṅ tan enak, tan aṅga mampəlan hana vvaṅ len, nahan ta lvir saṅ mahāpuruṣa. apa hetu nirān sinaṅgah mahāpuruṣa? samaṅkana krama nira: durlabha vih kadāhan iṅ indriya ṅaranya, tan vvaṅ baribari ikaṅ vvaṅ saṅ vənaṅ tāḍana riṅ viṣaya. meṅəta ta saṅ ārya:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">jihvopasthanimittaṁ hi pravr̥ttiḥ sarvadehinām</l>
. <l n="b">tasmād amitravat paśyej jihvopasthau vicakṣaṇaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
850 <p>ikaṅ sarvalokan papravr̥tti, ikaṅ jihvā lavan pasta nimitta nika, hyun iṅ mamaṅana lavan arəpniṅ masaṅgama. maṅkana pva ya mataṅnyan kadi musuh de saṅ paṇḍita mulat iṅ jihvāpasta. kaliṅanya, inərətnira ta ri viṣayanya. apa dumeh sira tan sakta riṅ viṣaya?</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">dhyāyato viṣayān puṁsaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ikaṅ vvaṅ jənək riṅ viṣaya,</p>
855 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">ṣaṅgās teṣūpajāyate</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yeka kedə̄ riṅ janasaṅgama,</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
860 <l n="a">ṣaṅgāt saṁjayate kāmah,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ikaṅ janasaṅgama agave gə̄n kāma,</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">kāmāt krodho ’bhijāyate,</l>
865 </lg>
. <p>yāvat hanaṅ kāma ginə̄ṅ, byakta dadi kaṅ krodha.... avas pamuharanya moha.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">saṁmohāt smr̥tivibhramaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
870 <p>maṅavaśa pvekaṅ moha, hilaṅ taṅ tutur de nika.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">smr̥tibhraṁśād buddhināśaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hilaṅ taṅ tutur, tatan hanaṅ buddhi yukti.</p>
875 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">buddhināśād vinaśyati,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>tapvan hanaṅ buddhi yukti, hilaṅ taṅ vvaṅ, tan hana rat. saṅkṣepanya: tiṅgalakən juga ta pvaṅ rāgadveṣa, hayva vineh maṅicchā riṅ viṣaya; byakta kapaṅguhniṅ <pb edRef="#edG" n="47"/> jñānaprasāda de nika. mapa ta deniṅ vvaṅ kumavasakənaṅ indriya? svantahan kva liṅa saṅ ārya, nihan katonanya ri saṅ viku:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
880 <l n="a">yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṁ tasyām jāgarti saṁyamī</l>
. <l n="b">yasyāṁ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ikaṅ vəṅi riṅ sarvaloka, ya ika pataṅyan saṅ viku ṅaranya; ikaṅ pataṅyan ikaṅ rat kabeh, ya hiḍəpnira vəṅi. kaliṅanya tan aṅga kapaḍana yāvat kadhīrabratan.</p>
. <p>nambah hulun, aum aum, mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa! guhyāti paramārtha ikaṅ sapajar ra hadyan saṅhulun kabeh. ləbakəna tāṅənaṅən parameśvara, yan yogya davakəna təkap ra hadyan saṅhulun majarajara dharma.</p>
885 <p>uḍuh aum aum bapa saṅ ārya phalguna, tan saṅśaya rakryan, nihan paramārthanya:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">devān bhāvayatānena te devā bhāvayantu vaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">parasparaṁ bhāvayantaḥ śreyaḥ param avāpsyatha,</l>
. </lg>
890 <p>yāvat kita bhaktya riṅ devatā, tāvat masih ikaṅ devatā ri kita. ṅaran iṅ maṅkana parasparopasarpaṇa. yāvat paropasarpaṇa ikaṅ dadi, tāvat kapaṅguh ikaṅ hayu təkapta. kunaṅ ya tan r̥ṇa ikaṅ devatā kinabhaktyan,</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yo bhuṅkte stena eva saḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kevalāmuktya tan pagavayānugraha riṅ vvaṅ bhakti, sākṣāt cora ṅaran iṅ hyaṅ yan maṅkana. astam tikaṅ vvaṅ mamukti bhoga, tan paṅhanakən ta devabhakti, antyaniṅ sinaṅgah maliṅ ika. mataṅnyan deya saṅ vruh:</p>
895 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yajñaśeṣāśinah santo mucyante sarvakilviṣaiḥ</l>
. <l n="b">kṣamante te tv aghaṁ pāpā ye caranty ātmakāraṇāt,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yajñaśeṣa bhinuktinira saṅ mahāpuruṣa ṅaran ira, mataṅnyan tan kəneṅ sarvamala sira. kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ anaḍah kevala mivə̄ śarīranya juga, yeka saṅapa kapaṅguh de nika. luməkasa magavaya devabhakti, kapva pinakaṅhulun, <pb edRef="#edG" n="48"/> nyapan tahan kva liṅa saṅ ārya, kaham pisih; apan hana hulun sumiddhakəna saprayojanante rika. ikaṅ səḍaṅ kinārya juga siddhakəna maṅke de saṅ ārya. tan surude rikiṅ raṇakriyā.</p>
900 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">śreyān svadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yadyapin vināguṇa lvir nikaṅ svadharma, ndan ləvih juga ya saṅkeṅ paradharman ginavayakən. paradharma ṅaranya si tan dharmaniṅ kṣatriya.</p>
. <p>məne tasən sājñā haji, lvir avitan muvah təkap nikiṅ dhanañjaya ataña ri parameśvara; kṣamakəna təmən panambah patik haji ri saṅ nātha. asaṅghātapralāpa liṅa ra hadyan saṅhulun i rike. pira kari lvirni japa parameśvara, mataṅnyan paripakva dahat riṅ sarvatattva? ndo varahən patik haji, kasihana ri mūlamadhyāvasānanya teka pajarakəna parameśvara, yatanyan vruhaṅ pinakaṅhulun.</p>
905 <p>ḍu maṅka kapva kahyun saṅ ārya, mavaraha ṅhulun i rakryan yan maṅkana.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna</l>
. <l n="b">na tāni vedmi sarvāṇi na tvaṁ vetsi paraṁtapa,</l>
. </lg>
910 <p>paḍa mara janmani ṅhulun lavan kita, tan len makaṅga catvāri kita kalih, sahotpəti juga kita. ika ta janmani ṅhulun lavan janmanta təlas atītakāla, tan eṅət ṅhulun i lvir nika kabeh. maṅkanātīta tan atutur ate rika. tuhun kumva ta keṅət i ṅhulun:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yan lvir agərah aṅel ta pva saṅ hyaṅ dharma yukti,</p>
915 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">abhyutthānaṁ adharmasya,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ikaṅ adharmakārya lvir aṅadega, yapvan maṅkana,</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
920 <l n="a">tathātmānaṁ sr̥jāmy aham,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>i rika ta ṅhulun aṅjanma mavak aśarīra. nihan pih paramārthanya:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">paritrāṇāya sādhūnāṁ vināśāya durātmanām</l>
925 <l n="b">dharmasaṁsthāpanārthāya saṁbhavāmi yuge yuge,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="49"/> kaparitrāṇan saṅ sajjana mahāpuruṣa, hilaṅaniṅ sarvaduṣṭa, pagəhan iṅ dharmakārya, nahan don i ṅhulun mañjanmāṅkən sayugasayuga. kunaṅ phala nika:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
930 <l n="a">janma karma ca me divyam evaṁ yo vetti tattvataḥ</l>
. <l n="b">tyaktvā dehaṁ punar janma naiti māṁ etiso ’rjuna, </l>
. </lg>
. <p>yan hana vvaṅ kumavruh i janma niṅhulun, paramārtha denyāṅavruhi, byakta ta yan paśarīra, tan dadi ta ya punarjanma, ṅhulun juga paran ika, savasthāni kavaiṣṇavan tinut nika. nihan taṅ caturvarṇa, brāhmaṇa, kṣatriya, vaiśya, śūdra, guṇaniṅ samaṅkana lavan karmanya, ṅhulun atah prasiddha mibhāga ika. nistanyan maṅkana,</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
935 <l n="a">na <supplied reason="omitted"><!-- resp="#edG" -->māṁ</supplied> <app><lem type="emn">karmāṇi</lem><rdg wit="#edG">karmā<del>ma</del>ṇi</rdg></app> limpanti,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>tan rakət ikaṅ karma śubhāśubha ri ṅhulun. mataṅnyan maṅkana:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">na me karmaphale spr̥hā,</l>
940 </lg>
. <p>apayapan tan paṅabhimata phala ṅhulun, an papravr̥tti. maṅkana pva phalaniṅ tan paṅarəmbha phala:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyaty akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">sa buddhimān manuṣyāṇāṁ sa yuktaḥ kr̥tsnakarmavit</l>
945 </lg>
. <p>hana vvaṅ tan hiḍəpāvaknya makārya, an saṅ makārya, dadi ya humiḍəpāvaknya makārya, ri səḍaṅnya tan pakārya; ika taṅ vvaṅ maṅkana, ya ta buddhimān ṅaranya, yukti ya saṅguhən vruh iṅ sarvakārya, ri de nyan tan saṅgraha riṅ halahayu. saṅkṣepanya yan ləkasa pravr̥ttya ikaṅ mānuṣa, hayva juga ya sumandehaṅ phala kapaṅguha. kevala kasamyajñānanta kagəgə̄ denta, an səḍaṅ makārya, marapvan enak kapaṇḍitanya. nihan mara liṅniṅ śāstra:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yadr̥cchālābhasaṁtuṣṭo dvandvātīto vimatsaraḥ</l>
. <l n="b">samaḥ siddhāv asiddhau ca kr̥tvāpi na nibadhyate,</l>
950 </lg>
. <p>kavitkavita ta pvekaṅ phalāgavaya santuṣṭi, hayvāntukniṅ sagrahāṅarəmbha, hayva ta jənək riṅ janasaṅgama, <pb edRef="#edG" n="50"/> tan makambekaṅ mātsarya, samabhāgan taṅ maphala lavan niṣphala, yapvan maṅkana ləkasniṅ mavya ṅaranya, tan rakət niyata nikaṅ hala, apayapan maṅke prāayaścittanya de saṅ viku.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">dravyayajñās tapoyajñā yogayajñās tathapare</l>
. <l n="b">svādhyāyajñānayajñās ca yatayaḥ saṁśitabratāḥ,</l>
955 </lg>
. <p>hana dr̥vyayajña ṅaranya, yajña makasādhanaṅ dr̥vyopakaraṇa, salvirniṅ saji; hana ta muvah tapayajña ṅaranya, yajña makasādhanaṅ tapa; hana ta yogayajña ṅaranya vaneh, lvirniṅ yoga yajña vaneh; hanan svādhyāya riṅ sarvaśāstra; kunaṅ ikaṅ sinaṅgah yajña, bheda saṅkeṅ kasamyagjñānanyajña ṅaran ika, yatika inabhyāsa saṅ viku saṅ aṅəgə̄ brata, ika ta kabeh, ikaṅ jñānayajña juga ləvih. mataṅnyan maṅkana:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">sarvakarmākhilaṁ karma pārtha jñāne samāpyate,</l>
. </lg>
960 <p>apan ikaṅ sarvakarma kabeh kantaskr̥ta təkapniṅ jñāna niyatanya. apa hetuniṅ vruh i rika? svantahankva liṅa saṅ ārya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tad viddhi praṇipātena,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ulihniṅ panambah pi si,</p>
965 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">paripraśnena medhayā,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ya tan maṅkana, ulihniṅ lot matakvan, gurūpadeśa niyatanya, ya tan buddhi kaprajñānan kunaṅ makolih ika.</p>
. <p>uḍuh aum aum, mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa, mahāmr̥ta dahat ika rasenujarakən ra hadyan saṅhulun! kunaṅ pataña patik haji muvah: mapa karikaṅ karmasannyāsa lavan ikaṅ yogasannyāsa; ndya humur kaləvih nika? ntoh pajarən tekiṅ phalguṇa de ra hadyan saṅhulun.</p>
970 <p>oṁ, maṅkana kapva kaharəp saṅ ārya; rəṅvakəna teki vuvusni ṅhulun.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">sannyāsaḥ karmayogaś ca niḥśreyasakarāv ubhau <pb edRef="#edG" n="51"/>
. </l>
. <l n="b">tayos tat karmasannyāsāt karmayogo viśiṣyate,</l>
975 </lg>
. <p>ikaṅ karmasannyāsa lavan yogasannyāsa, paḍa ika makaphalaṅ kadhiśreyasan. kunaṅ yan timbaṅ vratən ika kalih, ləvih ikaṅ yogasannyāsa saṅkeṅ karmasannyāsa, apayapan dadi kaṅ luməkasa karma mamaṅguh duḥkha, ya tan pasahakāri yoga.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yogayukto munir brahma nacireṇādhigacchati,</l>
. </lg>
980 <p>kadi maṅkana tika saṅ viku maṅəgə̄ yoga, tan kapilon jugar paṅguh brahmaloka.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">kurvann api na lipyate,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>mon sirar ləkas mapravr̥tti, ndatan karakət ikaṅ hala ri śarīranira. apayan kumva pinakasvabhāva nira:</p>
985 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">paśyañ śr̥ṇvan spr̥śañ jighran,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yadyapin mulata juga sira, aṅrəṅə̄ tuvi, aṅambuṅa sarvagandha;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
990 <l n="a">aśnan gacchan svapan śvasan,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>mon maṅan ya, mon lumaku, mon aturu, mon pambəkan;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">pralapan visr̥jan gr̥hṇan,</l>
995 </lg>
. <p>yadyan mojar, maveveh kunaṅ, maṅalapa kunaṅ;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">unmiṣan nimiṣann api,</l>
. </lg>
1000 <p>yadyapin kuməḍapa kunaṅ, ṅuniveh duməliṅa, ndan kumva tāṅənaṅən ira,</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">naiva kiṁcit karomīti,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>tan aku iki mapravr̥tti, tan aku sumiddhakən paviṣayaniṅ sarvendriya. maṅkana tah təkap saṅ viku, tan dadi maṅaku riṅ sarvabhāvārəmbha;</p>
1005 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">na sa lipyati doṣeṇa,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>nahan ta mataṅnyan tan kaparatan doṣa mala,</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1010 <l n="a">padmapattram ivāmbhasā, </l>
. </lg>
. <p>kadyaṅganiṅ ron iṅ tuñjuṅ, tan karakətan siratniṅ vai. kunaṅ pinakajāti saṅ paṇḍita nihan:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">uddhared ātmanātmānaṁ nātmānam avasādayet</l>
1015 <l n="b">ātmaiva hy ātmano bandha ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="52"/> avaknira juga sādhana nirāṅhanakən śarīranira, tatan dadi mirsakit iṅ svaśarīra, apan tan hana kadaṅ ny avaknira, lena saṅke svaśarīranira, musuh ny avaknira, ya ta svaśarīranira. seṅ nikaṅ ujar maṅkana: ṅke śarīra ta pva saṅkan iṅ mitra mvaṅ śatru, udāsīna. riṅ avak mūlaniṅ hala lavan hayu. yan apan hayu? yan hayu kavaṅun deniṅ śarīra; yan kakavaśaṅ indriya de nikaṅ vvaṅ pisih, yatikāmaṅun hayu. yapvan tan kakavaśa pvaṅ vvaṅ deniṅ indriya, i rika ta yan hala kavaṅun de nikaṅ avak. ndya ta deyaniṅ vvaṅ, yatanyan kakavaśaṅ indriya? nyapan tahan liṅa saṅ ārya. kumva katonanya de saṅ paṇḍita:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1020 <l n="a">yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṁ rahasi sthitam</l>
. <l n="b">ekākī yaticittātmā nirāśīr aparigrahaḥ.</l>
. </lg>
. <p>satatāgave samādhi juga sira, linolya iniriṅ, ika saṅ hyaṅ ātma tar vinehnira mimba, śūnya tika sthānanira, tar dadi masahāya; kevalānuṅganuṅgal juga sira, umərət ikaṅ citta tan salah kvana paṅiketnira, mabratāṅgə̄ṅ nirahāra, tar dadi tr̥ṣṇā riṅ sarvaparigraha.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1025 <l n="a">samaṁ kāyaśirogrīvaṁ dhārayed acalaṁ manaḥ</l>
. <l n="b">saṁprekṣya nāsikāgraṁ svaṁ diśaś cānavalokayan,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>vinehnira ta paḍāndəl nikaṅ śarīra lavan gulu mvaṅ hulu, ikaṅ manah tan vineh prapañca, mulat ry agra nīruṅnira juga sira, tar dadi sumiṅhitakən tiṅhalnira riṅ dikvidik.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1030 <l n="a">yathā dīpo nivātasthaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kadi lvirniṅ dilahniṅ pañjut tan hanāṅin rūpanira, maṅkana ta lvir nirāləkas masamādhi; pinakambəknira taṅ kumva:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">ātmaupamyena sarvatra samaṁ paśyati yo janaḥ</l>
1035 <l n="b">sukhaṁ vā yadi vā duḥkaṁ sa yogī paramo matah,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="53"/> hinarimbavakən ira i śarīranira ta pva salvir nikaṅ bhāva, sama paṅiḍəp nireṅ sukha lavan duḥkha, samaṅkana pracāranira, sira ta viśeṣaniṅ yogi ṅaran ira. hana mata yan maṅke lvir nira:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1040 <l n="a">yo māṁ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṁ ca mayi paśyati</l>
. <l n="b">tasyāhaṁ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hana sira viku humiḍəp ri ṅhulun makavak sarvajanma hiḍəpnira mandəl ri ṅhulun, ika ta saṅ viku maṅkana kramanira, ṅkana ta ṅhulun tamolah tan pakahilaṅan, sira tamolahana ri ṅhulun sthiti tan hilaṅ. mataṅnyan kakavaśaṅ yoga ulihniṅ maṅabhyāsa hetu nika. manah vairāgyan grāhakerika, tatan kavənaṅ deniṅ tan utsāhayatna.</p>
. <p>sājñā haji mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa, hana kagamānta nikeṅ dhanañjaya, maṅguhaṅ jñānayoga, makanimittānugraha saṅ paṅəmpvan? kasihana patik haji, pajarən de parameśvara muvah!</p>
1045 <p>oṁ, katuhvan yan maṅkana, tan saṅśaya saṅ ārya. prastutanya pajaran i ṅhulun:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">bhūmir āpo nalo vāyuḥ khaṁ mano buddhir eva ca</l>
. <l n="b">ahaṁkāra itīyaṁ me bhinna prakr̥tir astadhā,</l>
. </lg>
1050 <p>ikaṅ pr̥thivī āpah teja bāyu ākāśa lavan buddhi manaḥ lavan ahaṅkāra, nahan taṅ tattva vvaluṅ siki daməlni ṅhulun. hana ta len saṅke rika daməlni ṅhulun, saṅ hyaṅ jīva ṅaran ira, prasiddha pinakahurip nikaṅ rat kabeh. ika ta samaṅkana yeka hiḍəpəntāpisan ri śarīra, makasādhanaṅ kāyika vācika mānasika. yapvan maṅkana,</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yathājñānaṁ labhiṣyati,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kapaṅguha taṅ jñāna paramārtha təkapta. mataṅnyan maṅkana:</p>
1055 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">ahaṁ kr̥tsnasya lokasya prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā</l>
. <l n="b">mattaḥ parataraṁ nānyat kiṁcid asti dhanañjaya,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>
1060 <pb edRef="#edG" n="54"/> ikaṅ rat kabeh, ṅhulun gumave hananya mvaṅ tan hananya; saṅkṣepanya, tan hana jagattattva yan lena saṅke ṅhulun.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">sūtre maṇigaṇā iva,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kadi rūpa nikaṅ manik mutyan pakatukaliṇḍən, maṅkana taṅ loka, an pakāśraya ṅhulun.</p>
1065 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">raso ’ham apsu kaunteya,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yāvat ikaṅ ve ṅaranya, ṅhulun pinakarasa ṅkana;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1070 <l n="a">prabhāsaḥ śaśisūryayoḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yapvan ikaṅ candrāditya, teja parnahni ṅhulun ṅkana;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">praṇavaḥ sarvavedeṣu,</l>
1075 </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ riṅ sarvaveda mvaṅ mantra, oṅkāra pinakavakni ṅhulun ṅkana;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṁ nr̥ṣu,</l>
. </lg>
1080 <p>yan iṅ ākāśa, śabda pinakavakni ṅhulun ṅkana, yan iṅ mānuṣa, ātma andəlni ṅhulun ṅkana;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">puṇyo gandhaḥ pr̥thivyāṁ hi,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yan iṅ pr̥thivī, gandha rakətni ṅhulun ṅkana;</p>
1085 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tejo ’smi ca vibhāvasau,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>maṅkana yan iṅ apuy, teja uṅgvan i ṅhulun ṅkana;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1090 <l n="a">jīvikā sarvabhūteṣu,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yan iṅ sarvajanma, ṅhulun pinakahurip nika kabeh;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tapaś cāsmi tapasviṣu,</l>
1095 </lg>
. <p>ṅhulun pinakatapa saṅ tapasvi;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">buddhir buddhimatām asmi,</l>
. </lg>
1100 <p>ṅhulun pinakabuddhi saṅ prajña;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">balaṁ balavatāṁ cāham,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ṅhulun pinakaśakti sinaṅguh mahāśakti; ṅhulun sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ;</p>
1105 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">caturvidhā bhajante māṁ narāḥ sukr̥tino ’rjuna <pb edRef="#edG" n="55"/>
. </l>
. <l n="b">ārto jijñāsur arthārthī jñānī ca bharatarṣabha,</l>
. </lg>
1110 <p>narāryārjuna, pat lvir nikaṅ vvaṅ sumevita ṅhulun, lvirnya: vvaṅ alara minta śaraṇa, vvaṅ ahyun vruheṅ sarvatattva, vvaṅ aṅarjana mas, vvaṅ jñāni, yogīśvara. kunaṅ ləvih sadhāraṇa ri ṅhulun ṅkana, saṅ jñāni juga prasiddha kāptini ṅhulun. ṅhulun pinaran ira ya nirbāṇa. kaliṅanya:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">bāsudevaḥ sarvam iti,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ikiṅ kr̥ṣṇa pinakavakniṅ sarvahana. yogamāyāni ṅhulun i rikeṅ sakalajagatmaṇḍala pavakni ṅhulun ikaṅ anāgatavartamāna. ndatan asiṅ vvaṅ vruh ri tattvani ṅhulun, saṅ yogīśvara sira vihikan.</p>
1115 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">jarāmaraṇamokṣāya mām āśritya yatanti ye</l>
. <l n="b">te tad vidur brahma kr̥tsnam abhyaktaṁ karma cākhilam,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>lavan ikaṅ vvaṅ bhakti ri ṅhulun, jātinya tan kataman jarāmaraṇa, sumambit i kavruh riṅ brahmamantra, vihikan riṅ sinaṅguh karmādhyātmika; lavan ta vaneh phalanya:</p>
1120 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">antakāle ca mām eva smaran tyaktvā kalevaram</l>
. <l n="b">yaḥ prayāti sāhaṁbhāvaṁ sa yāti paramāṁ gatim,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>hana vvah alara meh matya, ndatan vuruṅ juga ya maṅənaṅən ri ṅhulun, byakta ṅhulun paran ika, tan vaneh, byakta ya mariya maśarīra, salvirniṅ hayu pinaṅguhnya. maṅkana pva ya ta,</p>
1125 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca</l>
. <l n="b">mayy arpitamanobuddhir mām eṣyasi na saṁśayaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kumva ta deya saṅ dhanañjaya: ṅhulun jugānusmaraṇanta nityaśa, ri kālantālaga maṅke, ṅhulun prasiddhaṅənaṅənənta. yapvan maṅkana saṅ ārya, byakta kita mantuk mare ṅhulun. kumva pih deyanta:</p>
1130 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">sarvadvārāṇi saṁyamya,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>atutupi tekaṅ navadvāra i śarīranta;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1135 <l n="a">mano hr̥di nirudhya ca,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>
. <pb edRef="#edG" n="56"/> t andəlakən tikuṅ manah rīṅ hr̥davapaṅkaja:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1140 <l n="a">mūrdhany ādhāya ca prāṇān,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>t ənah ta ri vunvunan saṅ hyaṅ prāṇabāyu;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">āsthito yoge dhārayet,</l>
1145 </lg>
. <p>gavayakəntaṅ yogadhāraka;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">om ity ekākṣaram brahma,</l>
. </lg>
1150 <p>hana tākṣara tuṅgal, oṁ liṅnya, yeka brahmamantra ṅaranya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a"><app><lem type="emn">vyāharan</lem><rdg wit="#edG">vyā<del>va</del>haran</rdg></app> <supplied reason="omitted"><!-- resp="#edG" -->mām anus</supplied>maran.</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ya tika unyakənanta, atəhər umanusmaraṇa ṅhulun. yāvat maṅkana, riṅ kapana ta kita tan paṅguha kasugatin?</p>
1155 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">idaṁ tu te guhyatamaṁ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave</l>
. <l n="b">jñānavijñānarahitaṁ yaj jñatvā mokṣyase ’śubhāt,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ ikaṅ rahasya təmən pajarakənani ṅhulun i ri kita, byakta kita luput saṅkeṅ karmaśubha, yan maṅkana. yat vruhe riki: ndya ya, nihan:</p>
1160 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">ahaṁ kratur ahaṁ yajñaḥ svadhāham aham oṣadhiḥ</l>
. <l n="b">mantro ’ham aham evājyam aham agnir ahaṁ hutam,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ṅhulun tika sinaṅgah kratu, ṅhulun yajña, ṅhulun svadhā, ṅhulun oṣadhi, ṅhulun mantra, ṅhulun miñak, ṅhulun śivāgni, ṅhulun pinakapūjā.</p>
1165 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">vedapavitram oṁkāram,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ṅhulun ika sinaṅguh veda, ṅhulun makavak oṅkara pavitra;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1170 <l n="a">r̥k sāma yajur eva ca,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ṅhulun tiki makaṅaran r̥gveda sāmaveda yajurveda;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">amr̥tañ caiva mr̥tyuś ca,</l>
1175 </lg>
. <p>ṅhulun tiki makaṅaran amr̥ta, ṅhulun prasiddha sinaṅguh mr̥tyu;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">sad asac cāham arjuna,</l>
. </lg>
1180 <p>ṅhulun tiki maṅaran sadasat, i vruha saṅ āryārjuna. maṅkana pva ya ta, <pb edRef="#edG" n="57"/>
. </p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat</l>
. <l n="b">yac ca paśyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva madarpaṇam,</l>
1185 </lg>
. <p>salvir nikaṅ sadinaməlta, asiṅ sapinaṅanta, asiṅ sapinūjākənta, asiṅ savinevehakənta, salvir nikaṅ tinontonta, ya tika arpaṇakənanta ri ṅhulun, marapvan luput saṅka riṅ karma śubhāśubha.</p>
. <p>apa kadibyanta karih? yan kva liṅa saṅ āryārjuna:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">jyotiṣām aham amśumān,</l>
1190 </lg>
. <p>ri sakvehniṅ mateja, ṅhulun ikāditya;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">nakṣatrāṇām ahaṁ śaśī,</l>
. </lg>
1195 <p>yapvan iṅ nakṣatra, ṅhulun ika sinaṅguh candra;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">devānām asmi vāsavaḥ.</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yan iṅ devatā, indra gatini ṅhulun;</p>
1200 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">rudrānāṁ śaṅkaraś caham,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>riṅ ekādaśarudra, ṅhulun sinaṅguh bhaṭṭāra śaṅkara;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1205 <l n="a">vitteśo yakṣarakṣasām,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ri sakvehniṅ yakṣarākṣasa, ṅhulun veśravaṇa;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">meruḥ śikhariṇāṁ aham,</l>
1210 </lg>
. <p>yapvan i sakvehniṅ vukir, ṅhulun ika mahāmeru;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">mahārṣīṇām bhr̥gur aham,</l>
. </lg>
1215 <p>kunaṅ yan i saṅ saptar̥ṣi, ṅhulun ikenaranan bhagavān bhrgu;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">aśvatthaḥ sarvavr̥kṣānām,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ yan iṅ kayukayu, ṅhulun ika sinaṅguh bodhi;</p>
1220 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">devarṣīṇāṁ ca nāradaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yan iṅ devarṣi, ṅhulun bhagavān nārada;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1225 <l n="a">gandharvāṇāṁ citrarathaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yan iṅ gandharva, ṅhulun citraratha;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">siddhāṇāṁ kapilo muniḥ,</l>
1230 </lg>
. <p>yapvan iṅ vātek siddharṣi, ṅhulun bhagavān kapila;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">uccaiḥśravasam aśvānām,</l>
. </lg>
1235 <p>kunaṅ yan iṅ kuda, ṅhulun ika ucceśrava;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">airāvaṇo gajendrāṇām,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>
1240 <pb edRef="#edG" n="58"/> airāvaṇa ṅhulun iṅ liman;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">narāṇāṁ ca narādhipaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ratu parnahni ṅhulun yan iṅ mānuṣa;</p>
1245 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">ayudhānām ahaṁ vajraḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ yan iṅ sañjata, bajra kapaṅguhni ṅhulun;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1250 <l n="a">sarpāṇām asmi bāsukiḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>bāsuki ṅhulun yan iṅ sarpa;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">baruṇo yādasām aham,</l>
1255 </lg>
. <p>saṅ hyaṅ baruṇa ṅhulun yan iṅ ivak agə̄n;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yamaḥ saṁyamatām aham,</l>
. </lg>
1260 <p>saṅ hyaṅ yama ṅhulun yan iṅ devatāṅḍaṇḍa;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">prahrādaḥ sarvadaityānām,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ṅhulun ikenaranan prahrāda yan iṅ daitya;</p>
1265 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">mr̥gāṇāṁ ca mr̥gendro ’ham,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>siṅha ṅhulun yan iṅ mr̥ga;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1270 <l n="a">vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>garuḍa ṅhulun yan iṅ manuk;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">rāmaḥ śāstrabhr̥tām aham,</l>
1275 </lg>
. <p>rāmabhadra ṅhulun yan iṅ vruh iṅ dhanurveda;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">akṣarāṇām akāro ’smi,</l>
. </lg>
1280 <p>kunaṅ ri sākvehniṅ akṣara, a ṅaran i ṅhulun;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">māsānāṁ mārgaśiro ’ham,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yapvan iṅ māsa, mārgaśira ṅhulun;</p>
1285 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">r̥tūnāṁ kusumākaraḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ yan iṅ r̥tu, basanta ṅaran i ṅhulun;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1290 <l n="a">vr̥ṣṇīnāṁ bāsudevo ’ham,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>yan iṅ vatək yadu, ṅhulun makaṅaran kr̥ṣṇa bāsudeva;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">pāṇḍavānāṁ dhanañjayaḥ,</l>
1295 </lg>
. <p>kunaṅ yan iṅ pāṇḍava, ṅhulun iki dhanañjaya;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">munīnām apy ahaṁ vyāsaḥ,</l>
. </lg>
1300 <p>ṅhulun ikīnaranan bhagavān vyāsa yan iṅ kamahāmunyan;</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ṅhulun ika maṅaran vr̥haspati yan iṅ sarvakavi; <pb edRef="#edG" n="59"/>
1305 </p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">oṣadhīnāṁ yavaśvāham,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>ṅhulun maṅaran yavaśva yan iṅ oṣadhi; kaliṅanya:</p>
1310 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">nānto ’sti mama vidyānāṁ vibhūtīnāṁ paraṁtapa,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>tan paparimāṇa ta pvāgamani ṅhulun mvaṅ vibhūtini ṅhulun.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1315 <l n="a">athavā bāhunaitena kim uktena tavārjuna.</l>
. </lg>
. <p>tvas jambat mateki deni ṅhulun majarajar. apan hana ujarni ṅhulun ṅuni, si manaṅgah makavak ikiṅ jagat, lvir saṅkṣepa gatinya.</p>
. <p>uḍu uḍu hahah, atyanta dahat ta karih kapavitran ra hadyan saṅhulun, mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa, vəkasniṅ sinaṅguh mahārahasya ike sokta ra hadyan saṅhulun, tatas ike puṅguṅ hane patik haji, deni vākyopadeśa parameśvara. ndan tumulusātah anugraha ra hadyan saṅhulun i rikeṅ dhanañjaya; yan yogya patik haji pintonana rūpa mahādbhuta mvaṅ kaiśvaryan parameśvara vaneh, kahyun patik haji katona. mara tan kapalaṅalaṅ varānugraha ra hadyan saṅhulun riṅ pinakaṅhulun.</p>
. <p>ḍu maṅka kapva kaharəp rakryan. tan saṅśaya rakryan.</p>
1320 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo vā sahasraśaḥ,</l>
. <l n="b">nānāvidhāni divyāni nānāvarṇākr̥tīni ca,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>tumiṅhala ta saṅ ārya pārtha i rike svarūpani ṅhulun, matusatus ivu lakṣa lvirnyan akveh, nānāvidha prakāranya, aneka varṇanya lavan ākr̥tinya. hanan dvādaśāditya, hanan aṣṭabasu, hanan ekādaśarudra, hanāśvinodeva, bheda saṅkeṅ devatā, kaniṣṭhamadhyamottama, ikaṅ tapva yan katon iṅ lagi, tiṅhali taṅ sakalajagatmaṇḍala, mapiṇḍa ṅke śarīrani ṅhulun. mapa tāmbəkta, hana karika vaneh kaharəpta katona, anuṅ paramārthani śarīrani ṅhulun kari kahyunta kapratyakṣā?</p>
1325 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">na tu māṁ śakyase draṣṭum anenaiva svacakṣuṣā <pb edRef="#edG" n="60"/>
. </l>
. <l n="b">divyaṁ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram,</l>
. </lg>
1330 <p>tan vənaṅ kita tumiṅhal kavat ikuṅ mateka kusādhananta təlas. kunaṅ yatanya t vənaṅa tumiṅhala, vehəṅkva kita kadibyacakṣusan, marapvan pratyakṣa denta mulat i keśvaryani ṅhulun. ndah kanəkətakən tiky anugrahani ṅhulun ri kita.</p>
. <p>maṅkana liṅ mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa ri saṅ dhanañjaya, atəhər siromintonakən kayogīśvaran ira mvaṅ kavaisṇavaśarīran ira. apa ta rūpa nira?</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">anekavaktranayanam anekādbhūtadarśanam</l>
. <l n="b">anekadivyābharaṇaṁ divyānekodyatāyudham,</l>
1335 </lg>
. <p>akveh ikaṅ mukha lavan mata, nānāvidhāścarya katinhalan ira, tan tuṅgal rūpa nikaṅ bhūṣaṇa rumakət ri sira, tatan papramāṇa kveh nikaṅ sarvāyudha ginəgə̄nira, salvirniṅ kambaṅ pavitra pinakasəkarnira təkeṅ vastragandhānulepana, tatan hana tan kadbhuta pinakarūpanira. tumiṅhal ta saṅ arjuna, vismaya manahnira, mogha muririṅ vulu ny avaknira, manambah ta sirātəhər mojar, liṅ nira: ‘sājñā haji, vastv adbhūta dahat katiṅhalan i śarīra ra hadyan saṅhulun; sakvehniṅ devatā maṅadhiṣṭhāna ry aṅga pratyaṅga śrī harimūrti, makādi saṅ hyaṅ brahmā, mvaṅ bhaṭṭāreśvara, ṅuniveh sakveh saṅ vatək rṣi, tapvan hana katon maṅkana təkapniṅ pinakaṅhulun. nda nihan taṅ vatək koravakula, mvaṅ bhagavān bhīṣma, ḍaṅ hyaṅ droṇa, śalya, karṇaprabhr̥ti, ya tika paḍa katon i pantarani huntu ra hadyan saṅhulun, lavan ikaṅ ratu samāna samāṅjuru riṅ korava, ndan syuh śata jarjarita tika katonanya kabeh, rəmpu rəmək lavan vāhananya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">yathā nadīnāṁ bahavo ’mbuvegāḥ</l>
. <l n="b">samudram evābhimukhā dravanti</l>
1340 <l n="c">tathāmī naranātha lokavīrāḥ</l>
. <l n="d">viśanti vaktrāṇy abhito dravanti,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>kadi rūpaniṅ veni nadīn tampuh riṅ tasik, maṅkana <pb edRef="#edG" n="61"/> tekaṅ vatək vīraprabhun katon tumama riṅ tutuk ra hadyan saṅhulun. hana ta yan kumva paḍapaḍanya:</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
1345 <l n="a">yathā pradīptam jvalanam pataṅgāḥ</l>
. <l n="b">śāntiṁ ca nāśam ca yamābhibhūtaḥ</l>
. <l n="c">tathaiva bhasmāṅgam āyanti lokāḥ</l>
. <l n="d">tavāpi vaktrāṇi samr̥ddhavegāḥ,</l>
. </lg>
1350 <p>kadi rūpa nikaṅ larularun tampuh iṅ apuy səḍaṅ umurub, makadon vināśa, matīkan kakavaśa deniṅ tamah, maṅkana ta katonan ikaṅ ratuvīra kabeh, an tame vaktra ra hadyan saṅhulun, makāntaṅ bhasmībhūta juga ya.</p>
. <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">ākhyāhi me ko bhavān ugrarūpah,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>mataṅnyan, sājñā haji, varahən juga pinakahulun, saṅapa ra hadyan saṅhulunn makarūpan kātarādbhuta?</p>
1355 <lg xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a">namo ’stu te devavara prasīda,</l>
. </lg>
. <p>tiṅhalana ta sambahniṅ pinakahulun ri jə̄ṅ hyaṅ mami, kasihana ta pinakahulun anugrahana, saṅka yan ahyun vruhe ra hadyan saṅhulun pinakahulun, apan tan hana devatā riṅ lagi kadi pravr̥tti ra hadyan saṅhulun maṅke.</p>
